133'a2(mdo): du yongasu bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od gzer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu sim par gyu rad nas/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par byas snyam ste/ des phan tshun du bltas so//
133'a3(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das dge'i slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ khyim de'i nang du gshegs nas/ khye'u le lo can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu cha gnyis kyis brgyand pa
133'a4(mdo): dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang kis brgya nad pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba sta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang mchog
133'a5(mdo): tu dga' bar 'gyur te// 'phral rang nyid langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan gshams te/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so// bcom
133'a6(mdo): ldan 'das gdan gshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad kyang smras so// de nas de'i pha ma dang / nang gi myi rnams kyi sa sngon ma mthong ba'i gus par sgrim pa mthong na mchog tus mtshan tu
133'a7(mdo): gyud to// de nas khye'u le lo can gyis mdangs phyung ba'i srog dang ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de sa

133'b1(mdo): bdag gis phyir zhing brtson 'grus brtsam par bya kor ma chag snyam nas/ des mnyan du yod par dril gyi sgra bsgrags te// bdag nyid kyis ded dpon bya bar bsgrags nas/ rgya mtsho chen po la lan drug rgal/

133'b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u lo lo can gyi sku gcig nas cig tu brgyud pa dang / las cig nas gcig tu bsrung ba mkhyend nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dum
133'b4(mdo): pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de// de'i tshe zhal nas 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro/
133'b5(mdo): ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thi// ka naka dang / bsdus 'jom dang / du 'bod dang / d+ya 'bod che// na po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar myed pa dang / chu
133'b6(mdo): bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kye hudazer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ma star kas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas// tsha thA/
133'b7(mdo): sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab po/ grang ba'i sems cad dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab po// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par de
133'b8(mdo): ngag che zhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
133'b9(mdo): srul pa 'gyed pa mdzad de// de dag gis srul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur da ya/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i
134a1(mdo): sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams che zhim par gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sruld pa la sems mngon par dka' bar gyur nas/ sems
134a2(mdo): can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de// lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du gang bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der/ nying mtshams 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni
134a3(mdo): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dka' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams
134a4(mdo): dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / chad myed 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge 'chung rnams dang / tshad myed dgel rnams dang /
134a5(mdo): dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin myed rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu chernams dang / myi che rnaMs dang / myi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shind tu ma
134a6(mdo): rnams dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi bar tu song nas/ rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa 'i sgra spogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod pa
134a7(mdo): byed do// nges par 'byung ba bajam par gyis/ sangs rgyas bstand pa la stsor bar gyis/ 'das bu'i khyim la gra tshor bzhid// 'chi bdag lde gnom par gas// gang gis chos 'dul 'di nyi
134a8(mdo): ban yong spyod par byed pa ni// lte ba'i 'khod rngub spangs nas/ sdug bsngas zang par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod par byed do// de ras 'od gser de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
134a9(mdo): gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam sogs su myi snang bar 'gyur
134b1(mdo): ma 'ongs pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye
134b2(mdo): bar lung stond par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi gting par myi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi mthe bor myi snang bar 'gyur ro// myir skye bar lung stond par
134b3(mdo): bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por sung stond par bzhed na ni// phyag kasngo pA me this du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston
134b4(mdo): par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du myi snang b.ra' gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni// lte bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni
134b5(mdo): zhal du myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub/ tu lung stond par bzhed na ni// sprin mtshams kyi mdzod spur/ myi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
134b6(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni// dbu'i gtsug tor du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan
134b7(mdo): kyi dbu'i gtsug tor tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon snga stong kis spel ba tshogs can mang po zhal gi sgo nas byung bar
134b8(mdo): gyurang // de'i sa phyogs rnams kun tu sdang bar bgyis// nyi ma sha dad par ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gso lad pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dgyes spangs pa'i/
134b9(mdo): sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyurd pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i cha dang dung mdog lta bu 'dzum myi stonang // brtan pos nyid kyis dus bab mkhyend
135a1(mdo): lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khrung mchog gi ni gsung mchogs brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol
135a2(mdo): rgya mtsho dang nir rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'di 'dzum gyi stodang // de gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzub pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo pal chen nyan par 'a#
135a3(mdo): gams di ma/ don de bzhin te// kun dag 'o de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ sku myed rkyen myed par 'dum pa myi mdzad do// kun dam
135a4(mdo): bo khye'u le lo can 'dis/ ngal 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngas/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo khye'u le lo can 'di dge ba'i lba ba 'dis/ sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i
135a5(mdo): chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ skald pa grangs myed pa gsu gyis yang dag par bsgrubs par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par ba sbubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bskos pa'i pha rol tu
135a6(mdo): phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i drad pa nye bar gnaka pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par
135a7(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ stobs dang 'artson 'grus dang / mthu phas dang shi nad tu ldan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang pa la mngon par dka' ba/
135a8(mdo): gyurd pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sa lad nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa sa mngon par bstod do//
135a9(mdo): gang po las batshogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa// / bam po gnyis pa// / ded dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
135b1(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha nas dang / kla rnaMs dang / gnod sbyin nas
135b2(mdo): dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
135b3(mdo): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
135b4(mdo): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zod rnam sa brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod dz+rab na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ khyim bdag mgon myed zas
135b5(mdo): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ra bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du so// da pa na/ ded dpon chen po zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du gru bub ste/ phyin 'ongs nas des lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du/
135b6(mdo): thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/ rgya mtsho' chen po'i nang du zhugs na/ 'on kyang gru bub ste phyir 'ongs so// de nas de myi dge 'a ba chen po skyes nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis
135b7(mdo): thabs gang gis nor bsdu bar bya ba'i thabs ci yod snyam mo// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ lha thams cad las kyang ches khyad par du 'phags te/ bdag la phan pa
135b8(mdo): dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ thugs rje can bdag nyid chen po/ chos la gus pa/ skye dgu la mnyes gzhin pa yin gyis// da ni bdag gis 'di la brtend te/ yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang tu zhugs
135b9(mdo): la gru'i don legs par grub ste/ phyir 'ongs na nor phyed kyis 'di la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo// des de ltar brtson 'grus byas te/ yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus rin po ni
136a1(mdo): gling du phyin nas/ rin po che chen po bsdus te/ bde ba dang nyes zho myed par bdag gi khyim du phyind to// de ngal so nas snod bzlugs na/ des rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas/
136a2(mdo): chags pa chen po skyes te/ bdag gis rin po che 'di lta bu dag/ dge sbyong ko'u ta ma la byed ci ltar byin snyam du sems pa la zhugs te// sa la bdag gis 'di rnams bdag gi chung ma'i lag tu zho'i ban
136a3(mdo): ca gcig tu btsongs la/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas zho bzhi'i cha gcig gis ka ru'i spos nyos nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal du song ngo // de nas shin/
136a4(mdo): tu ngo che bzhin du sgo gang du 'dug na/ a ka rus bdugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis 'dug pa de steng gi nam mkha' la yang dag par 'phags te/ mnyan tu yod pa thams cad khyab pa/
136a5(mdo): gyur nas/ sprin chen po'i mgo ltar 'dug par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mdzad do// des lha dang myi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu mad tu byung ba de mthong
136a6(mdo): nas/ dka' ba chen po skyes te/ bdag gi sems la baHda bkag nas/ gang bdag gis rin po che'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bslu ba 'di ni bdag gi cha ma yin no zhes byas//
136a7(mdo): de nas ded dpon des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ khyim gyi nang du bshos la spyan drangs so// de nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas// rin po che chen po dag
136a8(mdo): gis gtor to// de nas rin po che de dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas
136a9(mdo): rin po che'i khang pa dang / khang pa b.legs pa rin po che'i rgyas mtshan can/ mgar ba'amakar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed myi nus pa de lta bur gyurang te 'dug go// de nas ded dpon
136b1(mdo): des cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ phyed kyis dag las skyes te sdong po tsha ba nas bcad pa bzhin du// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i phra ba dang sems
136b2(mdo): bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'drend pa myed cing / yongs su 'drend pa myed par/ sems can ma rga lad pa rnams bsgrol ba dang / mgron
136b3(mdo): ba rnams 'gro lad pa dang / dbugs ma phyind pa rnams dbug 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams/ yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur da cig ces byas so// de nas/
136b4(mdo): ldan 'das kyis ded dpon de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa mkhyend nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
136b5(mdo): gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po/ rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni ste/
136b6(mdo): tu 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / du 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu
136b7(mdo): tsha ba dang / mnar myed pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kye hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad me ltar gas pa dang / pan ma ltar kla
136b8(mdo): pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyur da te 'bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyurd te bab bo// de nas
136b9(mdo): sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams che zhil bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de na
137a1(mdo): de dag dad pa skyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprus pa 'gyed pa mdzad de// de dag gis yul da pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par su
137a2(mdo): myu ra da ya// gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams che zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag phrul pa la ses
137a3(mdo): mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du kar tu bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzind par 'gyur ro//
137a4(mdo): steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu gsum pa rnams dang / 'bab bral rnams dang / dka' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul
137a5(mdo): dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i/ mdun na 'dod pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'ochung rnams dang / chad myed 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams/
137a6(mdo): dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad myed dge ma rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin myed rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnam sa dang / 'bras bu ze nas dang / khyi tshe nas dang myi gdung rnams dang / gya nom/
137a7(mdo): snang rnams dang / shi nad tu mthong rnams dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kya
137a8(mdo): brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang gis chos 'dus/
137a9(mdo): 'di nyid la// bka yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod do// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po
137b1(mdo): 'jig rtend kyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su myi snang ba
137b2(mdo): 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa la las lung stond par bzhed na ni// mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi mthil tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro//
137b3(mdo): rlung 'gror skye bar lung bstond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi gting bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi mthe bor gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// myir skye bar lung /
137b4(mdo): stonang par bzhed na ni// pus mo gnyis su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ste dang par bzhed na ni// phyag g.yon pa'i ma thil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro//
137b5(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung stond par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar/ sung stond par bzhed na ni/ lte bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro//
137b6(mdo): nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni// zhal tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sung ste/ nad par bzhed na ni// sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spur myi snang bar
137b7(mdo): 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu srung stonang par bzhed na ni// dbu'i gtsug to tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
137b8(mdo): bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbya rad te// bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// tshon sna stong gis spe
137b9(mdo): ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de'i sa phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar gis// nyi ma sha rad pas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/
138a1(mdo): rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dgyes spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i cha dang dung
138a2(mdo): mdog lta bur 'dum myi stond// brtan po nya kyi bo dus bab mkhye nang lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyam pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyung mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang
138a3(mdo): bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bA gsol/ rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'da' 'dzum myi stond// gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzum pa
138a4(mdo): ston mdzad pa// de na khyod las skye bo 'phel cher nyan par 'a tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa// kun da ka' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te// kun dga'
138a5(mdo): po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/ pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu myed rkyen myed par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dga' bo dad dpon 'dis nga la 'di/
138a6(mdo): lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lag/ sa so// kun dga' bo ded dpon 'di/ dge' ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems skyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gto/
138a7(mdo): pa 'dis/ bskalang pa grangs myed pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bskos pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su
138a8(mdo): rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos man/
138a9(mdo): ces bya bar gyur da te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni// gang nga la sems mngon par dka' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
138b1(mdo): bka' yad nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal
138b2(mdo): po rnams dang / blo chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
138b3(mdo): lha ma yin nams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mya 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te// lha dang / klu dang / gnod
138b4(mdo): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang /
138b5(mdo): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos/ dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal
138b6(mdo): khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug sa so// de nas mnyan du yod pa na/ zag pa zla ba zhes bya ba dbul zhing mchog tu dbul ba zhig gnas so// de
138b7(mdo): yang las cin ma zhig byed pa de tsam nyi tse'i zan rnyed par zad de// des cung bad kyang bzhag tu myed do// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te// bdag ni 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bsod nas
138b8(mdo): ma byas par 'dir 'ongs la/ 'dir yang dge ba myi byed pas/ 'di nas 'jig rten pha ro sang tu yang bsod nams kyang ma byas/ dge' ba yang ma byas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mgon sgrubs
138b9(mdo): kyang ma byas par 'gro dgos srid kyis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la/ sna 'ga' zhig gis mchod pa bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas des khyim bdag gzhan gni ki ras btags nas/ des
139a1(mdo): de las ras kyi tshar tshar khyer te srang du zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lung zed bsdams nas/ mnyan tu yod par bsod snyoms la gshes
139a2(mdo): so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sku mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe' byang bzang po brgya bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom kang gyis brgya nad pa/ nyim
139a3(mdo): stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas 'bang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag /
139a4(mdo): la phan gdags pa'i phyir nyid kyi chos gos rayang par bstand to// de nas des ras kyi tshar char de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i mod la chos gos drubs par bstan
139a5(mdo): to// de nas de rgya cher dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'dra/ kyi zhabs sa phyag 'tshas te/ smon lam btab pa// sbyin pa nub sa ni pa rgya che ste// mthu chen khyod nyid thugs su chud pa'i
139a6(mdo): byas// sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis na/ bdag ni chen grags pa'i sangs rgyasakon// sbyin pa 'di ni chung ngu lags kyis kyang / bdag gi sems ni rab yangs dpag yas te/
139a7(mdo): kyi dang / ma gyibs bzhed na ni// ljin bachung yang 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la da ba// khyod de kyis pazhi ba'i ma sa pa/ shAchen grags pa myi dang sras marjod pa//
139a8(mdo): rang 'byung 'jig nyid pan pa snyid 'azer ltar// tsamathar tham zhes bya rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das// bka 'a bru ba'i na ku tsig nas gcig tu bcung ba dang // sa gcig nas gcig
139a9(mdo): bsrung ba mkhyend nas 'dum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi cha/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de// de'i tshe zhas nas 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar /
139b1(mdo): dang / dkar po dag byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdud 'joms dang /
139b2(mdo): 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar myed pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kye hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa
139b3(mdo): dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po gang yin pa de dag ni bsil bar gyurd te 'bab po/ grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa
139b4(mdo): de dag tu ni dro bar 'gyur te 'bab po// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams che gzhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas
139b5(mdo): shi 'phos nas/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sru la pa 'gyed pa mdzad de// de dag gis sru la pa mthong nas 'di
139b6(mdo): snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos par ma gyur da la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi// 'on kyang sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus// bdag cag gi gnod pani
139b7(mdo): khyad par rnams che zhil bar gyur da to snyam mo// de na de dag sruld pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas// sems can dmyal ba myong ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du gang du
139b8(mdo): bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang
139b9(mdo): 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rna
140a1(mdo): dang 'od chung rnams dang / tshad myed 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / chad myed dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin myed rnams dang / bsod/
140a2(mdo): nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / myi che rnams dang / myi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shind tu mthong rnams dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas myi rtag pa dang /
140a3(mdo): sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed do// nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas stan la sbyor bar kris/
140a4(mdo): 'dam bu'i khyim la grang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom bar gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// zag yod myod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/
140a5(mdo): sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod par bya/ da do// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis/ stong gsum gyi stong / chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'a
140a6(mdo): kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'i las lung stonong par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sngam logs su myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa las
140a7(mdo): srung stond par bzhed na ni// mdun sogs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung
140a8(mdo): stodang par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi rting par gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// yo dgas su skye bar lung stonod par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// myir skye bar lung stond par bzhed nan
140a9(mdo): bral mo gnyis su kyi spang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyis 'kham sos sbyar ba'i rgyal por lung po dad par bzhed na ni// phyag maman pa' mams rba gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor mo mi srung ba'i tshu
140b1(mdo): por lung stond par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// spar skye bar lung stonang par bzhed na ni/ lte bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston
140b2(mdo): par bzhed na ni// zhal du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni/ sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spur myi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
140b3(mdo): byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
140b4(mdo): tsug tor du myi snang bar gyur da to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyard te// bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa tshon snga stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgra
140b5(mdo): nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma sha rad pas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// ya/ nga tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags
140b6(mdo): dang myi dgyes spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur da pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par pad ma'i cha dang nyung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum myi ston // brtan
140b7(mdo): po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyud mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bas
140b8(mdo): bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ro rab lta bu martan pa'i// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'da' 'dzum myi stond// gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzum pa stond mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye
140b9(mdo): phal cher mnyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa// kun dka' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo/
141a1(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu myed rkyen myed par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dga' bo zag pa zla ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam// btsun pa mthong yasa?/
141a2(mdo): so// kun dka' bo tha ka pa zla ba 'di/ dge ba'i tsha ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis// bskayad pa grangs myed pa gsum gyis yang dag par
141a3(mdo): bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
141a4(mdo): ma 'dres pa'i dran pa gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas char tshar bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i
141a5(mdo): chos ni gangang la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yi/ na no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
141a6(mdo): pa la mngon par bstod do// che ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sa rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang /
141a7(mdo): pho brang 'khor ki myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi 'am ci dang /
141a8(mdo): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rna
141a9(mdo): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ 1na
141b1(mdo): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan tu yod par rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon gyi bu che ba zhes bya ba zhig
141b2(mdo): gnas so// de yang khro ba'i kun nas bkris pa shas che ba zhig ste/ rdzogs byed la sogs pa stond pa drug la mchod pa byed do// de phyis nad tshabs po che zhig gis thebs te de sman pa dang / nad g.yog myed de
141b3(mdo): shi la gtugs nas/ 'di snyam du bsams te/ da ni bdag sdug bsngal bar gyurd pa'i skyabs byed pa'am/ srog 'phangs pa sbyin par byed pa sangs rgyas ma yin pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo// de nas
141b4(mdo): de ltar bsams nas/ sangs rgyas la gsol ba 'debs so/ de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni myi mkhye nad pa'am/ myi gzigs pa'am/ myi rtogs pa'am/ thugs
141b5(mdo): su myi chud pa ci yang myed la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la/ zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba
141b6(mdo): zla myed pa/ gnyis su myi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag ma zong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa sa/ sum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la
141b7(mdo): mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rga lad pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shi nad tu marta nad pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis myi 'jigs pa
141b8(mdo): khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge sI n+do'o sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs
141b9(mdo): rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun kI me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa stond pa/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa
142a1(mdo): stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis
142a2(mdo): nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi gyen gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dang / su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam dra bar gyurang/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan
142a3(mdo): su mi 'phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ras ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / tha dad pa dang / 'phra
142a4(mdo): bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'das du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun myed pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/
142a5(mdo): su ni dge ba'i phra ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par byasu dge ba'i cha ba bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su sbyind zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam
142a6(mdo): du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// 'dir smras pa/ mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ tus rlabs mol bar 'gyur ma bsrid/ gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ sangs rgyas
142a7(mdo): dus las yol ba myed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu che ba'i gnas skabs de gzigs nas/ 'od gaper gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag
142a8(mdo): gyis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so// bskalang pa stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od gzer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu yod du sem par gyur to//
142a9(mdo): nas bcom ldan 'das de'i sgo gang du gshegs nas/ sgo srungs kyi gyis bcom ldan 'das skon bzhugs lo zhes smad do// de nas tshong dpon glo bu cheb dga' bar gyu rang te/ dbugs kyi phyind pa dbugs
142b1(mdo): phyi nad par gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so// bcom ldan 'dran du gshegs su gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to// de nas
142b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs nas gdan gshams pa la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba la bka' saHsad pa/ che ba khyod la gnod pa ci zhig yod/ che bas gsol
142b3(mdo): pa// bdag la lus kyi gnod pa dang / sems kyi gnod pa mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i gdam ngag bstan te// 'di ni khyod kyi sems
142b4(mdo): kyi sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po yin no zhes bka' saHyang to// de nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de// kye ma lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang las/ sman gshai ri ka khyer
142b5(mdo): te 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs pa dang / bcom snga/ na 'das kyis thugs bskyed pa'i mod la/ lha'i dbang po ba/ rgyu byin gyis/ ri spros kyi ngad ldang las sman ka shi ri ka blangs
142b6(mdo): te// bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// bcom ldan 'angs kyis kyang nyid kyi phyag tu bzhes nas/ che ba la byin te/ 'di ni khyod kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa yin no zhes
142b7(mdo): bka' saHlad to// de nas des lus dang / sems shi nad tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'dral sems dga' bar gyurd to// sems dga' bar gyu rid nas// rgyal po gsal
142b8(mdo): rgyal la bsnyad de// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol na/ 'bum ri ba'i nam bza' mus te/ me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng thams cad kyis
142b9(mdo): mchod pa byas so// de nas sems la rtas par byas te smon lam btab pa dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ ji ltar bcom ldan
143a1(mdo): 'dra zan myed pa'i sman pa'i rgyal pos bdag gsos pa bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa myed cing yongs su 'drend pa myed par sems can ma/
143a2(mdo): rgal ba rnams smol pa dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grel pa dang / dbugs myi phyind pa rnams dbugs 'byind pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams/ yongs su mya ngan las bro ba'i sangs
143a3(mdo): rgyas su gyurd cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba'i rgyu gtsog nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyend nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs
143a4(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de// de'i tshe zhal na su 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni
143a5(mdo): 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang /
143a6(mdo): 'bod chen po dang / rtsa ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar myed pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rngom dang / so thams tham sa dang / kye hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la lca
143a7(mdo): kas pa dang / pad ma sbyar gas dang / pad ma lta gas pa chen por song nas/ chu ba'i sems can dmyas pa gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyu rad te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal
143a8(mdo): gang yin pa de dag tu bro bar gyur te 'bab po// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par che zhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos
143a9(mdo): 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed pa mdzad de// de dag gis srul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag na
143b1(mdo): 'di nas kyang shi 'phos pAshA ma gyurd la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams che zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/
143b2(mdo): de nas de dag srul pa la sems mngon par dka' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de skad kyi rnams kyi nang du kang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams
143b3(mdo): 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ras rnams dang / sum bcu pa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dka' rnams dang /
143b4(mdo): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad myed 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang /
143b5(mdo): dge chung rnams dang / tshad myed dge' rnams dang / dge rgyas rnam/ sa dang / sprin myed rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang // / 'bras bu che rnams dang / myi che rnams dang / myi gdung rnams
143b6(mdo): gya nom snang rnams dang / shind tu mthong rnams dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba da stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs
143b7(mdo): su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed do// nges par 'byung rnam par gris// sangs rgyas stan la sbyor bar kas// 'dam bu'i khyim la klang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang rmi
143b8(mdo): chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod khyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis
143b9(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang te// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'a
144a1(mdo): // kyi snam logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi mthil du myi
144a2(mdo): snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi rting par myi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor myi snang bar 'gyur ro//
144a3(mdo): myir skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung stond par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor
144a4(mdo): sos sbyang ba'i rgyal por lung stond par bzhed nani/ phyag gas sa pa'i mthil cu myi ltung bar 'gyur ro// skar skye bar lung ston pa bzhed na ni/ skye bar gyi ldang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi bya
144a5(mdo): tu lung ston par bzhed mni/ zhal du gyi ldang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu bsod par bzhed na ni// sbyin sam/ mas kyi mdzod srung gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// than byed pa yang /
144a6(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stonang par bzhed na nigatsug tong du myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gisabacom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom
144a7(mdo): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon lnga stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ mang po zhal rkyen
144a8(mdo): nas byung bar gyur // de nimi phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma gard pas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgong dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dgyes spangs pa ni
144a9(mdo): sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi nges pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal pa dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen mchis par// pad ma'i a dang dung mdog lta bur 'dzum gyi stodang // brtan po nyid kyi blo yim nus pab mkhyen
144b1(mdo): lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyam pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khrung mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri/
144b2(mdo): rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams byin 'pho' tum mye stonang // gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// @
144b3(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' saHyang pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu myed rkyen myed par
144b4(mdo): 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyim bdag gi bu che ba 'dis/ ngal 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dka' bo khyim bdag gi bu che ba
144b5(mdo): 'di dge' ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ skal pa gra/ ngas myed pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang/
144b6(mdo): chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bskos pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i
144b7(mdo): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te// 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i
144b8(mdo): chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
144b9(mdo): bar bstod do// / pad ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon
145a1(mdo): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / snga ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen/
145a2(mdo): po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mtsho/
145a3(mdo): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi
145a4(mdo): dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan tu yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal/ khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// gang gis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma
145a5(mdo): byung ba'i snga rol mni/ rgyal po gsal rgyal lha gzhan dag la/ dus gsum tu me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me rton 'phreng dang / byug pa rnams kyis mjed par byed do// gang
145a6(mdo): che bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas ni/ gzho nu lta bu'i mdo'i dpes/ rgyal po gsal rgyal btul nas/ bcom lnga na 'das kyi bstand pa sa dad pa rnyed de// dga' ba dang yid
145a7(mdo): bdel ba skyes nas/ dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi zad tu 'gro zhing / par me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byed do// de na
145a8(mdo): re shig na kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma zhig gis/ me tog pad ma gsar du byung ba zhig khyer de// rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thad du mnyan du yod par song ba dang / mu stegs can gi dge bsnyen zhig gis
145a9(mdo): mthong nas/ kye byi pa ki pad ma 'o ni 'tshong ngam zhes dris so// de na me 'tshong po zhes zer ro// de nyo 'dod pa las/ re shig na khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin der phyi nang te/ des de las rin nyis 'gyur
145b1(mdo): tu bskyed nas/ de gnyis phan tshun du gtod de 'bum 'gyur gi bar du bskyed do// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma 'di snyam du sems te/ khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin 'di ni dgod bag can ma yin te/
145b2(mdo): sems can brtan po yin pas na/ 'di la ni don zhig yod kor ma chag snyam mo// de the tsom skyes te/ mu stegs can la dka' ba'i myi de la dris pa/ khyod kyis su'i don tu 'di ltar skyes par byed/ des smras pa
145b3(mdo): nga ni bcom ldan 'das sred myed kyi bu'i phyir skyed par byed do// mgon myed zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ nga ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi don tu skyed par byed do// kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas smras pa// sangs
145b4(mdo): rgyas ye shes bya ba de su yin// de nas mgon myed zas sbyin gyis de la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgyas par bshad do// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas/ mgon myed zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim bdag pa nyid
145b5(mdo): kyis bcom ldan 'das del mchod par bya'o// de nas khyim pa ngag mgon myed zas sbyin gis/ kun dgalar ba'i srungs ma de wi/ da de// bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song nas/ kun dga'ar
145b6(mdo): ba'i srungs ma des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgya nad pa/ dbye byad bzang po brgya bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis
145b7(mdo): brgya nad pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu/ kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu kun dgang ba srungs ma des/ pad ma de bcom ldan 'das la bor ro// de nas
145b8(mdo): bor ma thag tu pad ma de shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng na 'dug go// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma res/ cho 'phrul de mthong nas sdong po che ba nas bcad pa bzhin du/ bcom
145b9(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyard te/ sems la rtas par byas nas/ smon lam btab pa/ dge' ba'i zha ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'das/
146a1(mdo): bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa myed cing / yongs su 'dren pa myed par/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grel pa dang / dbugs kyi phyind pa rnams dbun
146a2(mdo): 'byind pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur da cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma de rgyu gcig na
146a3(mdo): gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa mkhyend nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gong gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de// de'i tshe zhal nas
146a4(mdo): 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni/ sems can dmyal

146a6(mdo): thams dang / kye dud zer dang / a u ber dang / sung kyiltar gas ba dang / padas lta gas pa dang / pad ma sta gas pa chematha la ranas/ ma ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa ded/ ni ma
146a7(mdo): bar gyu dad te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de das ni dro bar gyur da te 'bab bo// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams che zhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di
146a8(mdo): snyam chu sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas kyi 'phos sam/ 'od te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa skyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das yu yad pa 'byed pa mdzad de/ de dag gis smras
146a9(mdo): ba de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur da la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'dis/ bdag gi gnod pa'i/
146b1(mdo): khyad par rnams che zhil bar gyur to smras so// de nas de dag phrul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyu rang nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / myi rnams kyi nang du ga
146b2(mdo): du bden pa rnams kyi sdod du rung bar gyur pa der nying mtshams 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rjes
146b3(mdo): dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dka' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnaMs dang / tshangs pa chen po nas dang / 'od chung des dang tshad myed 'od rnams

146b5(mdo): dang / myi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / nad tu mthong rnams dang / 'og myin kyi lha rnams kyi bar du so// nga nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong ldi dang /

146b7(mdo): chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod khyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/
146b8(mdo): zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams skor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das
146b9(mdo): pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sngam logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// seMs
147a1(mdo): can dmyal bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung stonang par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi gting bar gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas

147a8(mdo): khyim ga ra pas ji skar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad te gsos pa/ nod dang bral zhing rgyags dang kyi dgyes spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag ga dam pa'i tshur gyu dad pa// rgyas
