204a3(mdo): nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ longs spyod 'di dag ni chu tha lta bu'i rang bzhin can// smig rgyu dang 'dra ba/ myi rtag pa/ myi brtan pa zer zug ma yin pa/ yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos ca
204a4(mdo): gnod pa chen po lnga dang 'thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol la/ zhal zas
204a5(mdo): bzang pos tshim par bya kor ma chag snyam mo// de nas des rba/ com ldan 'das nyan thob kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol/ ba dang / gdugs tshod gsol bar yun drangs so// de nas
204a6(mdo): des phan gdags pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'du dang bcas pa/ dge slong gi tshogs gyis nam ring byas te/ dge slo gi dge' 'dun gis mdun du bdamanas/ chog dang ldan pa'i wa
204a7(mdo): la gshegs so// de nas tshong dpon de tig mar spod ca khyer te/ bsrogang du song nas/ bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dgel 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas gang gi tshe/
204a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhus gsol zin pa de'i cha// khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dgel 'dun dang bcas pa la/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bamam
204a9(mdo): gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs so// rang gi la ga nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa stabs nas/ bcom
204b1(mdo): ldan 'das bgos gsul ban te/ gsang lder ni gyi/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ces dpa' bzhin khyer te/ chos nyar pa'i phyi bcom ldan 'das kyi yun sngar 'dug nas// des bcom ldan 'ang/
204b2(mdo): kyis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan du/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yang yang gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtas nam grangs du mas yang dag par bas dang / ya /
204b3(mdo): dag par 'dzind tu bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ cang myi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas tshong dpon de dad pa rnyed nas/ sdong po la ba nas bcad pa bzhin du/
204b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sems ya rtas par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes
204b5(mdo): kyi gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad po'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal na/ sa 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dka/ ra po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig
204b6(mdo): ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sam sa can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu chab
204b7(mdo): dang / mnar myed pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyai hud zer dang / a nu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad pa ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa
204b8(mdo): chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de daHni bsil bar gyur da te 'bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar 'gyur te 'bab po// des na sems ca
204b9(mdo): de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse gzhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dang
205a1(mdo): sbed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das 'phrul pa 'gyed pa mdzad de// de dag gis srus pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'dinas shi 'phos par ma gyur das/
205a2(mdo): gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'od kyi sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'dis// bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams the zhil bar gyur da to// de nas de dag sru lad pa la sems mngon par dag
205a3(mdo): bar gyur da nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du
205a4(mdo): 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang /
205a5(mdo): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang // tshangs pa mdun na 'dond pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnam/ sa dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad myed 'od rnams dang /
205a6(mdo): 'od gsal rnams dang / dge 'chung rnams dang / tshad myed de/ 'arnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin myed rnams dang / ba sod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mye che
205a7(mdo): rnams dang / mya ra ba rnams dang / myi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shind tu mthong rnams dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
205a8(mdo): stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas stan la sbyor bar gyis/ 'dam bu'i khyim la glang
205a9(mdo): chen bzhin 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod gyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur//
205b1(mdo): zhes 'arjod par byed do// de nas 'odag zer de dag gis stong gsus kyi stong yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsko na sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bA 'in 'brangs te/ klus te bcom lda 'das kyis 'ang/
205b2(mdo): pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi sngam sogs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i yas lung stonang par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems nA
205b3(mdo): dmyal bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston/
205b4(mdo): par bzhed nA ni/ 'bas kyi mthe bor myi snang bar 'gyur ro// myir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni// pus mo gnyis su myi sta ra bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lu
205b5(mdo): stond par bzhed na ni// phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du myi snangabar 'gyur ro// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston lnga ci gang+gA pa 'i ma 'ang 'gyu na sus bung me pa ba da na gyi lA yus/ nyan thos
205b6(mdo): kyi byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni// zhal du myi snang ba 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu supa stond par bzhed na ni/ sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spur gyi sdang bar 'gyur ro//
205b7(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni/ shu'i gtsug tor tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lar gsum bskor ba byas te// brtse
205b8(mdo): ldan 'das kyi sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod sur myi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyard te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon snga stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// tsha
205b9(mdo): mang po zhes kyi sgonas byung bar gyur // de yis phyogs rnams kun tu sdang bar bgyis// nyi ma sha rad pas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad te gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang rgya
206a1(mdo): dges spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro bdag kyi dam pa'i rgyur gyu rapa// rgyal ba cu thub rnams mi rkyen ma mchis par/ pad ma' ya bdud mdog lta bu'i 'dzum gyi ston du// brtan po nyid kyi/
206a2(mdo): blosas dus bab mkhyenang lags // dge slong rgyal dbang nyan paso ma nyi 'chal ba rnams/ thub pa byur can zhe ni gsung mchog btan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mam ngani
206a3(mdo): kyil sa bur brtan pa'i// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'da' 'dum gyi 'o dang // gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dum pa stod mdzad pa// de'i byed las skye bo phal chen nyer par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis
206a4(mdo): bkal baN lad pa// kun dga' bo do ni de bzhin no// dor de ba dam te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni myi myed rkyen myed par 'dzum pa
206a5(mdo): kyi mdzad do// kun dka' tshe chang dpon 'dis pa la 'di lta drung bkung bzhi byas pa mthong ma// btsun pa mthong lags mod/ kun dga' bo mong dpon 'di'i dgel ba'i sa ba dang / sems bsgo
206a6(mdo): pa dang / sbyid par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas mdog 'jam zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i skyid par bya ba'i chos ni krung po la sems par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag des
206a7(mdo): na'adi gar bslab par bya n+d+he/ ngas rgyal dang / ngapangs rgyas dang / nyan nam rnams sa 'grang bzhi tshun na / dge 'aslong byed kyis de ltar bsas par rgyam// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ga ces bka'
206a8(mdo): nas dge slong dag yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// pa na / 'damams shes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
206a9(mdo): rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi gyi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon nams dang / lha rnams dang / ku rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
206b1(mdo): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
206b2(mdo): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
206b3(mdo): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon myed zas kyi kun dga'
206b4(mdo): ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan tu yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor ma la longs khyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzind pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu/
206b5(mdo): 'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de// de yang dad pa dang ldan pa// dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba// bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan// la phan pa la zhugs so// snying rje che ba bdag nyid che ba/ chos
206b6(mdo): 'dod pa skye dgul la byams pa zhig go// de nas de 'di snyam du sems te// longs khyod 'di dag ni chu bla lta bu'i rang bzhin can glang po che'i rnam pa ltar g.yol ba/ myi rtag pa/ myi brtan pa//
206b7(mdo): zer zug ma yin pa/ yid brtan tu myi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang / thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis/ bdag gi longs spyod snying po byed pa las/ snying po blang bar kor ma chag snyam mo/
206b8(mdo): des sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge la 'dun dang bcas pa/ gdugs chod la spyan drangs nas/ khyim yang rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo myed par byas te/ tsan dan gi chus
206b9(mdo): ni chag chag btab/ spos sna tshog kya snod ni bkram/ dri zhim po'i bdug pas ni bdugs/ me tog sna tshogs ni gtor / me tog gi gdan rnams ni gshams so// de nas khu ba bsil ba'i btung ba rnams dang
207a1(mdo): dusas 'dun kyil bdun pa mas 'as pa/ sa dal / @#/ ma 'a
207a2(mdo): sa de'i dus la bab par dgo sa te/ gshegs su gsom zhes bskus to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drogs pabs dang / chos gos gsosod te// srung zed snams nas/ dge' slong sa sa
207a3(mdo): kyis zham ring byas te// dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis zham ring byas nas// khyim bdag de'i khyim ka la ba der gshegs te/ byon nas dge slong gi dge la 'dun gi gung la gdan bshes pa sa bzhugs so/
207a4(mdo): de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la batshogs pa/ dge' mo dang gi dge' 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bcwas bzang pos tshim par byas te/
207a5(mdo): ci bzhed pa bstabs so// rang gi lag nas 'ba' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs so// bcom ldan 'das bshos sa
207a6(mdo): zin te// gsang sder na gyu/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dpa' ba zhig khyer te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'ad kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
207a7(mdo): bdag chos kyi gtam shes yang dag par bstan/ yang dag pa'i 'dzi nang tu bcug/ yang dag par gzong bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtas rnam bcu mas/ yang dag par
207a8(mdo): bstand/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dka' bar mdzad nas/ cad myi gsung bar 'khrugs so// de nas khyim bdag de dad pa skyes te// bcom ldan
207a9(mdo): 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// sems la rtas par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'dzin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
207b1(mdo): ba'i chos nyid de// de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de/
207b2(mdo): dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu ba dang / mnar myed pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang /
207b3(mdo): so thams thams dang / kyi hud zed dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar kas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu
207b4(mdo): ni bsil bar 'gyur te 'bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmya la ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar 'gyur te 'bab po// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams che zhis
207b5(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye mi bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skye/ sA sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa skyed pa'i phyir
207b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'phrul pa 'gyed pa mdzad de/ de dag gis srul pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos pA ma gyur la gzhan du lnga ma skyes yod kyi 'on kyang
207b7(mdo): sngon ma byung ba'i sems can sdang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams che zhil bar gyu rad to snyam mo// de nas de dag srul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sos
207b8(mdo): can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du gang du 'den pa rnams kyi snod tu rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni
207b9(mdo): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris
208a1(mdo): rnams dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'dond pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad myed 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad myed
208a2(mdo): dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / srin myed rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / myi chernams dang / myi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shind tu mthong rnam/
208a3(mdo): dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung
208a4(mdo): ba bajam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ 'chi bdag sngon gzhom par kyis/ gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ bka yod spyod par byed
208a5(mdo): ba ni/ skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ sdug bsnga/ ge la zad par byed par 'gyur/ zhes brjod par byed do// de nas / 'od gzer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
208a6(mdo): khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs ste// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi snam yo/
208a7(mdo): su myi snang bar bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung stonang par bzhed na ni/ bdun logs su myi sdang bar myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar lung stonang par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du skye
208a8(mdo): snang bar 'gyur ro// gdud 'grong skye bar lung sond par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi ting bar gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// se rigs su skye bar srung stond par bzhed na ni/ rnabs kyimatho thi gyi snang bar 'gyur ro/
208a9(mdo): phyir skye bar lung spro dang par bzhed mn-i// pus mo gnyis su gyi sdang bar 'gyur ro// stozas gyi 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal por lung stod par bzhed na ni/ byug g.yon pa'i mthil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro//
208b1(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por skye bar lung sngo nad par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung sto nang par bzhed na ni/ lte bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi bya
208b2(mdo): chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni zhal du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni/ sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spur myi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzo/
208b3(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smon 'tshams
208b4(mdo): kyi mdzod spur myi snang bar gyur da to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyard te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ mang po zhal gyi sgon
208b5(mdo): byung bar gyur da// de'i sa phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyisanyi ma sha rad pas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su ba cad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dges
208b6(mdo): spangs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur da pa/ rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i cha dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum myi stond// brtan po nyid kyis blo yis
208b7(mdo): dus bab mkhyen lags na/ dge' sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes la yas la yar gsol na/
208b8(mdo): rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyas lta bur brtan pa'i/ mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni 'ang 'dzum myi stonang/ gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal
208b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mtha kha pa kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu myed
209a1(mdo): rkyen myed par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'dis pal 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam// btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo khyim 'das
209a2(mdo): 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas 'od bsil zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dang /
209a3(mdo): par byas pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na/ 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bstir bya'o zhe/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab
209a4(mdo): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sal de nas/ dge slong dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nasungasa' pa la mngon par bstod to//
209a5(mdo): mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnam/ sa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
209a6(mdo): dang / ded dpon nam dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams da gnod sbyin rnams dang / snam yi rnams dang / nam mkha' rnams dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnam
209a7(mdo): kyis bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri yo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / ska ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lha 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod
209a8(mdo): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ nam bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
209a9(mdo): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ma ga dang ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ gang ka'i klung gi 'gram du byond to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te// dge' slong gi dge/
209b1(mdo): 'dun gis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan pa rnams ga la bder gshegs te byon nas/ mnyan pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka' ba la to// kye chu klung 'di las nga sgrol cig/ mnyand pa rnams kyis gsol
209b2(mdo): gru bcas gsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyand pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' sa yang to// pa yang sngon mnyan pa byed byed de// ngas dka' bo ni 'dod chags ni chu klung du srung ba las
209b3(mdo): bsgral/ sor 'phreng ni zhe sdang gi rgya mtsho srung ba las sgra yang / bram ze'i bu nga rgyal gis khengs pa ni/ nga rgyal gyi mtshor ltung ba las bsgral// lteng rgyas 'od srung mi gti mug gi mtshor ltung ba las bsgrald te/
209b4(mdo): 'on kyang ngas gru btsas ma blangs so// de skad ces bka' saN+Dal da kyang bsgral bar khas ma blangs so// de nas mnyan pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yang thos
209b5(mdo): gzugs phun sum 'tshogs pa yang mthong nas/ dad pa skyes sa te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa bsgral bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to// de nas
209b6(mdo): dge slong rnams grur zhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gis/ mnyan pa de bas kyang ches snga pha rol kyi 'gram du zhugs par gyurard to// de nas mnyand pa des rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
209b7(mdo): de mthong nas/ sems dga' bar gyur te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ mnyand pa des de mthong nas/
209b8(mdo): 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri lo che mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa
209b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchil ma'i rgya mtsho skams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho rasi dang tha rad pI sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang myi rnams
210a1(mdo): kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu'i ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis ma bgyis/ nang myi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis
210a2(mdo): sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang gsol pa/ nyes pa mang po ldan pa ngan song lam/ shin tu myi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ bas
210a3(mdo): nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba rtse// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis di ring nyes pa spangs pa'i khyig/ shind tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho par
210a4(mdo): rga yang // 'phags par dges pa'i gzhi pa'i gos par thob/ myi mchog dbang po kyi dang lhas mchod pa/ skye dang rga dang shi pa 'in spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba las// thub pa
210a5(mdo): khyed ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de'i nang nas mnyand pa gaH/ ka gis 'gyod pa skyes nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ nyes pa bshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
210a6(mdo): nyan thos kyi dge la 'dun dang bcas pa la bshos gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid
210a7(mdo): de'i chegs nas 'od gcer sngon po dang / seng po dang / dbang pa dang / dkar po dmas thung nas/ khacig na 'og tu 'am// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag di/ sems cad dmyal pa
210a8(mdo): pos dang / bzhi nag dang / bsus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / chab dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar myed pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams khams dang / kyi hud zer
210a9(mdo): a cu ber dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma star gas pa chen por song nas/ cha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar 'gyur te 'bab po// grang ba'i ma
210b1(mdo): can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag sbyin dro bar 'gyur te 'bab po// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams gcig zhil par gyu dad to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'din sa na
210b2(mdo): 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan tu skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das phrul pa 'byed pa mdzad de/ de dag gis sru la pa mtho nas/ 'di snyam tu sems te/ kye bdag cag
210b3(mdo): 'di nas kyang zhi 'phos par ma gyur nga la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes yod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyang par rnams gce gzhol bar gyur to snyam mo// de na pa de/
210b4(mdo): dag la sems dka' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmya la ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ skra dang myi rnams kyi nang du kang du 'den pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams
210b5(mdo): 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag tu nirgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams/ dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul
210b6(mdo): dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs rim rnams dang / tshangs pa bdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa na po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / chad myed 'od rnams dang
210b7(mdo): 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad myed dge' rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / srin myed rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / myi che rnams dang / myi gdung nas
210b8(mdo): dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shind tu mthong rnams dang / 'og byin gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa' dang / bdag myed pa'i sde spogs so// rigs
210b9(mdo): su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung ba bapham par gyis// sangs rgyas bstand la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ gang zhig cho//
211a1(mdo): gang zhig chos 'dus 'di nyid la// bag yod gyod par byed pani// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sug bsngal bad par byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer
211a2(mdo): de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'o 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dra bri mas lung stonang par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan
211a3(mdo): 'das kyi snam logs su myi snang bar gyur to// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs
211a4(mdo): kyi mthil tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung / nad par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par myi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lub stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi ye
211a5(mdo): bor gyi snang bal 'gyur ro// myir skye bar lung stonod par bzhen na ni/ pus mo gnyis su gyi ldang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi la khor lo sbyang ba'i rgyal por lung stonang par bzhed na ni// phyan
211a6(mdo): g.yon pa'o ma thil tu gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na da/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthis du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// s+yAr skye bar lung stond par bzhed na nI/ lte bar bye smra
211a7(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston du par bzhed du ni/ zhal du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu supa stonod par bzhed na ni/ sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spur gyi sdang bar 'gyur ro//
211a8(mdo): tha ra byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sung ston papa bzhedun ni/ dbu'i gtsug to tu kyi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la san gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom
211a9(mdo): ldan 'das kyi spyan mtshams kyi mdzod sur mya sdang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyard te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ mang po zhal
211b1(mdo): gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur // de'i sa phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma sha rad pas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad te gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dges spangs
211b2(mdo): ba'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi ram pa'i rgyur gyur da pa/ rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i cha dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum myi stond// brtan po nyid kyi blo ya si dus bab mkhyen
211b3(mdo): lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bu
211b4(mdo): brtan po'i// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'ad 'dzum myi ston// gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/
211b5(mdo): b.lad pa/ kun dka' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dka' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu myed rkyen myed par 'a
211b6(mdo): pa myi mdzad do// kun dga' bo mnyand pa 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i sems dka' ba bskyed pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong la/ sa so// kun dga' bo mnyand pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
211b7(mdo): sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis// ma 'ongs pa'i nus na rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba rgal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang pa la sems dad par
211b8(mdo): byas pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste// sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bstir bya'o zhes/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// /
211b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlang pa dge' slong dag yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba ni/
212a1(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon nams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
212a2(mdo): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / gyi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ phra mar byas/ ri mor byas
212a3(mdo): mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing zhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams
212a4(mdo): chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhas zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sun gsos dang / smad zong rnams brno sa pa/ nyan thos kyi dge la 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i 'a
212a5(mdo): ma 'od ma'i tshis bya ka yan da ka gnas pa na rtend cing bzhugs so/ de'i yul dbus 'khod pa'i lus kyi rnams kyi sug kyis na/ phal cher phyag pa sdu tshogs kyi lus skud pas byed do/
212a6(mdo): de nas re shig na/ khyim bdag gi bu zhig yod pa de'i bran mo dad pa dang ldan la/ dge' zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de/ can dang dmar po bdar zhing 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham
212a7(mdo): 'bus dang / chom gos gsolang te/ srung zed bsdams nas/ dge slong tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gis mdun du bad pa nas/ rgyal po'o khab du bsod snyoms la gshegs so// dem
212a8(mdo): nu ma des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu pa gnyis kyim legs par brgya dadapa/ rib 'byang bzang po bcus sangs par byam pa/ 'od 'dim gang gis brgyan pa
212a9(mdo): nyi ma myong bas lhag pa'i 'od mngar ba/ rin 'i che'i po bo 'gro ba lta bu'i kus nas bzang pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bu mo de dang pa skyes so// de nas dad pa rnyed nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdas
212b1(mdo): kis 'di lta bu zhig rnyed kyang dbul ba'i nyes pas/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti byed myi nus na/ bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di 'dra ba ci dgos snyam mo// de nas des rang gi srog la yang ma bltas te/ lag pa gnyis
212b2(mdo): kas tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la bskus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i kheb rild kyis tsan dan gyi dris gang bar mdzad do// de nas
212b3(mdo): bu mo des rdzu 'phrul de mthong nas/ sems dka' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ sems la rtas par byas te/ bdag dge' ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par
212b4(mdo): bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas
212b5(mdo): gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'o// da gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam sa byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gror
212b6(mdo): 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni// sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig naka dang / bsdus 'joms dang / du 'gro da dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang /
212b7(mdo): mnar myed pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas
212b8(mdo): tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsol bar gyur te 'bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyurd te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyed
212b9(mdo): par rnams che zhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dang skyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
213a1(mdo): phrul pa 'gyed pa mdzad de// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ de nas de dag dang bskyed pa'i
213a2(mdo): phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sru lad pa 'byed pa mdzad de// de dag gis sru lad pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi
213a3(mdo): 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag gnod pa'i khyad par rnams tshe gzhil bar gyur da to snyam mo// de nas de dag sru lad pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur da nas
213a4(mdo): sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba
213a5(mdo): gang yin pa de dag tu ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dka' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / ka
213a6(mdo): 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / sa pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad myed
213a7(mdo): 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / chad myed dge rnams dang / dge' rgyas rnams dang / srin byed rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang /
213a8(mdo): myi che ba rnams dang / myi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shi nad tu mthong rnams dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang /
213a9(mdo): bdag myed pa'i sgra spogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung ba bsam khar shes// sangs rgyas stan la sbyor bar gyis// 'das bu'i khyim la glang chen 'arnam
213b1(mdo): 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la bag yod khyod par byed pa ni/ skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba brjod do// de nas 'od
213b2(mdo): zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs ste// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni /
213b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi sngam logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar sung stond par bzhed na ni
213b4(mdo): zhabs kyi mthil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar u nga stond par byed na ni// zhabs kyi rting par myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// nga yi dgas su skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi
213b5(mdo): mthe bor myi snang bar 'gyur ro// myir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobasakyi 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal por lung stond par bzhed na ni/
213b6(mdo): phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung stond par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthi la du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung stond par ba
213b7(mdo): na ni/ lte bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu phung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhal du myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni/ sbyin mtshams kyi
213b8(mdo): mdzod spur gyi sdang bar 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu srung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor tu mya sdang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
213b9(mdo): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mtshams kyi mdzod spur gyi snang bar gyu rad to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te// bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa
214a1(mdo): tshor snga stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can la// mang po zhal gyi skyo nas zung bar gyur // de'i ma phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar gis// nyi ma sha rad pas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// ya
214a2(mdo): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dges spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dam pa dag gi rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyend ma mchis par// pad ma'i cha dang
214a3(mdo): dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum myi stond/ brtan po nyid kyi blo ya se dus pab mkhye nad lags ma/ dge sbyong rgyas dang nyan ma ma nyaM 'thab nas// thub pa khyum chog ga ni gsung mchog btan pa dang / dz+ra po dag gri li tsa skyes pa bsal bAg mos// rgyamatsho dang ni nyi zla la zung brtan ni
214a4(mdo): mdo gas kyu sa kyi da cu gyi stod/ nga ga dod kyang dang 'du ldan pa shA de rdzob // bga'an kyi bka' saHlad pa// kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no de ni de bzhin te// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da
214a5(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu myed rkyen myed par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dka' bo bu mo 'dis pa la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lagaso/
214a6(mdo): kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge' ba'i pha ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rang sangs rgyas spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin pa
214a7(mdo): bya ba'i chos ni/ kang pa la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas ni 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bstir bya'o//
214a8(mdo): zhes dge' slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkal baHsad nas/ dge' slong dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
214a9(mdo): dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpo
214b1(mdo): rnams dang / lharnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod skyid rnams dang / lA ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / gyi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ bra ma
214b2(mdo): byas/ ri mor byas/ mchos par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
214b3(mdo): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du
214b4(mdo): yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshwa 'i bdag me myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma zhig yod de/ des so shing shig khyer te mnyan tu yod
214b5(mdo): par song ngo // ltas mkhan zhig kyang sgo ka na 'dug ste/ de na re / so shing 'di su za ba de ni/ zas ro brgya dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zhes zer ro// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas tshig de
214b6(mdo): thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ so shing de gang la byed na/ de'i rgyus bdag cher bkur bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni
214b7(mdo): rgyu ba dang myi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten na/ bsod nams kyi zhing 'gro ba 'bras bu yod pa yin gyis/ bdag gis 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam mo// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des
214b8(mdo): so shing de khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ kun dga' ra ba'i srus
214b9(mdo): ma des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag sa thugs phye ba'i slad du/ tshes shing 'di bzhes su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i
215a1(mdo): srungs ma la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang ba tsho'i snga ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas bzhes so// bsnyedan kyang de kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma'i mdun du gso lang to// gsol nas
215a2(mdo): kyang so shing de sa la btsugs so// de nas btsugs pa'i mdo de kho na'i skad cig la yal ka dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i shing / n+ya kro ta chen po'i chu zheng gab pa zhig du gyur /
215a3(mdo): de'i grib ma la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas/ lga dang / myi ru ma la la chos bstan to// de nas khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin gyis/ zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol to// de nas kun dga' ra ni
215a4(mdo): srungs ma de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul gyis/ sems dad par byas nas/ sdong po ba nas bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa/ dge' ba'i cha ba 'dis
215a5(mdo): bdag rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur da cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kang gi tshe 'dzum pa
215a6(mdo): mdzad pa'i chos nyid de// de'i tshe zhal nas 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu
215a7(mdo): 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / du 'bod dang / du 'bong chen po dang / chab dang / rab tu cha ba dang / mnar myed pa dang / chus sa
215a8(mdo): so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltur gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bam/
215a9(mdo): bar gyur te 'ba' bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba kas mI sa du 'i tshwa bar 'gyur te 'thab mo// des na sems can de dag gi gnong pa'i khyad par rnams me zhis par gyur to// de nas de dag 'di mam
215b1(mdo): sems te// kye ci bdag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das yul pa 'gyed pa mdzad de// de dag gis srusad
215b2(mdo): pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur da la// gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag kaM gnod
215b3(mdo): pa'i khyad par rnams kyi gzhil bar gyurd to snyam mo// de nas de dag sruld pa la sems dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong ba'i las de zad de// lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi
215b4(mdo): snod du rung bar 'gyur ba de nyid 'tshams 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ros rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dag
215b5(mdo): ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dang da byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na/ 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung
215b6(mdo): rnams dang / tshad myed 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang / tshad myed dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / srin myed rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang /
215b7(mdo): 'bras bu che rnams dang / myi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shi nad tu mthong rnams dang / 'og myin gyi sgra rnams kyi bar du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa
215b8(mdo): sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung ba bajam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstand la sbyor bar gis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni
215b9(mdo): gzhom par gyis/ gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod khyod par byed pa ni/ skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od gi
216a1(mdo): de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas// bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston
216a2(mdo): par bzhed na ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi snga ma logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar lung stond par
216a3(mdo): bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil cu myi skur bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung stonang par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi gting bar gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi
216a4(mdo): mthe bor gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// myir skye bar lung stond par ba dan ni/ pus mo gnyis su myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'jo ra lo sbyar ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni// phyags
216a5(mdo): pa'i mthil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal poralung stond par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mazil du myi snga bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ lte ba
216a6(mdo): myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lu stonang par bzhed na no// zhal du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu srung // nad par bzhed na ni/ sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spur gyi snang bar
216a7(mdo): 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor tu gyi sdang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas te/
216a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spur gyi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gi skyes pa sna tshogs can// mang po nas gyi
216a9(mdo): nas byung bar gyur // de'i sa phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar gyis// nyi ma sha rad pas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad te gsold pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dges spongs pa'i/
216b1(mdo): sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i cha dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum myi ston// brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyend lags na// dge
216b2(mdo): spyod rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni nyi rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i// / mgon po
216b3(mdo): rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'ang 'dzum myi stonang // gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzum pa stond mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHsad pa// kun dag/
216b4(mdo): bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu myed rkyen myed par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dag po kun
216b5(mdo): dga' ra ba'i srungs ma 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam// btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma 'di'i dge' ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems skyed
216b6(mdo): pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal da pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar myi 'gyur te// srid pa tha ma dang / gnas tha ma dang / lus tha ma dang / bdag gi ngo bo
216b7(mdo): tha ma thob pa/ rang sangs rgyas dri ma myed pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni/ gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na/ 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas
216b8(mdo): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bstir bya'o zhes/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar slab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad nas/ dge slong dag yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan
216b9(mdo): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / gdangs snyan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang /
217a1(mdo): pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / kA rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnad sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding nas/
217a2(mdo): dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
217a3(mdo): gyi'am ci dang / sgyu 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing zhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sun gsos dang /
217a4(mdo): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dgel 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pad/ rgyal bu rgyas byed kyi chas mgon myed pas snyid kyi kun dga' ra ba na 'phags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga nA~M/
217a5(mdo): shes pabs dang / chom gos gsol te/ srung med skams na sa/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms sa gshegs so// ma~M// dza'i ldel po mang po zhig kyang chang gis ra ma na myos nas/
217a6(mdo): bang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga thus rnams dang / rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ gar byed klu le nad la/ meHgsud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar
217a7(mdo): badrung / bar ga ga la ba migs pa/ me tog gi 'breng ba mang po yang masus chu btags nas/ gos byung par du 'phags pa dag bgos te/ mnyan du yod pa'i phyi rol tu byung ngo // de nas mdza' sde zo dag
217a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu pa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dbye byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa// sag sa lan mas da ma'am po tsho'i dzi/
217a9(mdo): 'gro ba la bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu de dag chang gis ra ro ba de las sangs par gyur to// de nas ra ro lalas sangs nas/ sems dka' zhing dad par gyur date/ ga dang / klu dang /
217b1(mdo): rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas so// ud pa la sngon po rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du gtor te// de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du khang pa brtsegs pa sngon po dang //
217b2(mdo): khang pa sngon po dang / gdugs sngon po lta bur gyur da te 'dug nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/ bzhengs na ni sdod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'od sngon po dag bkye ste/ 'od de dag gis many+dza
217b3(mdo): tu yod pa nor bu an da rnyil gyi mdog 'dra bar 'dug par byas so// de nas mdzarje po de dag bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te/ sems la rtas par byas/ dge ba'i tsha ba dang / sems skyed pa dang / sbyin par bya/
217b4(mdo): ba'i chos 'dis/ bdag cag rang byang chub mngon gsum du bye/ dad par gyur da cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 2dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
217b5(mdo): gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de// de'i tshe zhasanas 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni sted
217b6(mdo): tu 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni// sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig naka dang / bskus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar byed/
217b7(mdo): pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams sems dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar klas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i/
217b8(mdo): sems can dmyal ba'i gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsis par 'gyur te 'bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar 'gyur te 'bab po// des sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
217b9(mdo): rnams che gzhil bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan
218a1(mdo): 'das sruld pa 'gyed pa mdzad de// de dag gis sru sad pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bad// ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur da la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi
218a2(mdo): 'od kyang snon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag tug gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams zhes par gyu dad snyo mam mo// de nas de dag yul dpa la sems mdzo la 'gyur ranas// sems can
218a3(mdo): dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du gang tu bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgya
218a4(mdo): chen bzhi'i chos rnams dang / sum bcur rtsa gsum pa rnams dpa 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs che/
218a5(mdo): rnams dpa tshangs pa bdun na 'dond pa rnams dang / pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / rbad myed 'o rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang /
218a6(mdo): tshad myed dge' rnams dang / dge' rgyas rnams dang / srin myed rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu chernams de kyi chenams dang / phyi gdung rnams dang / bya ni ldang rnams dang /
218a7(mdo): shind tu mthong rnams dang / 'og sbyin gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ rtsi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra stsogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba
218a8(mdo): bsam par gyis// nga 'das bu'i khrim la grang chen bzhid/ 'di bdag sdeni gnos par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dus 'di nyings/ ngan yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor b.rang spangs te/ zug bsngal 'das
218a9(mdo): byed par 'gyur/ zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od gzer de dag gos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dra
218b1(mdo): pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar
218b2(mdo): skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par myi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/
218b3(mdo): zhabs kyi mthe bor gyi spang bar 'gyur ro// myid skye bar lung stonod par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su gyi spang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khakhos skur ba'i rgyal por lung stonadang par bzhed na ni// phyag g.yon pa'i/
218b4(mdo): mthis du gyi ldang bar 'gyur ro// 'kha los sbyar ba'i rgyal po da sung stond par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i ma'i la tu gyi lba bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/
218b5(mdo): bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni/ sbyin mtshams kyi
218b6(mdo): mdzod spur myi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor tu myi snang b.ra' gyur ro// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la yan
218b7(mdo): gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyind mtshams kyi mdzod spur myi snang bar gyurd to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon snga stong gis spel ba snga
218b8(mdo): tshogs can mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de'i sa phyogs rnams kund tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma sha rad pas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsold pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyag dang myi dges
218b9(mdo): spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyurd pa/ rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i cha dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum myi stonang // brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyend
219a1(mdo): lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ma
219a2(mdo): rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i// mgon pa rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'ang 'bum gyi stond// gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyi
219a3(mdo): bka' sarbasad pa/ kun dga' bo don de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te// kun dka' ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu myed rkyen myed par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do//
219a4(mdo): kun dka' bo mdze sde 'di rnams kyis pal 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam// btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga'abo mdza' sde po 'di rnams/ dge ba'i tsha ba dang sems bskye
219a5(mdo): pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bska pa nyi shu'i bar du/ sog par srung bar myi 'gyur te// srid pa tha me dang / gnas tha ma dang / lus tha ma dang / badz+ra
219a6(mdo): ki ribo za ma thob pan/ rang sangs rgyas gdangs stan zhes yan sdug tu 'gyur ro// de dag gi skyid pa bya ba'i chos ni gang la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin do// dge' slong dag des
219a7(mdo): na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bstir bya'o zhes dge slong khyed 'akyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad/
219a8(mdo): nas dge' slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / gang po la matogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad ba
219a9(mdo): pa rdzogs s+ho// / bam po brgyad pa// / sdo ma ni pad ma dang ni kham re dang / chos skyong de bzhin ni ldan dang / gzugs mdza'o'ibu mo dang / rim
219a10(mdo): rna bya byas na 'jimamam ma ma mngo ya mangs mams med ma gro byam byasemamanade la'a'i gyi ma gzubs ma ma kun mar
219b1(mdo): dang ni chos tshol dang / mgon myed zas sbyin rab bzang ba/ sde tshan dag tu bstand pa yin// pad ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnas
219b2(mdo): dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi gyi rnams dang / so pon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
219b3(mdo): dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / sto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi
219b4(mdo): ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang
219b5(mdo): snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge la 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis/ khyi bdag mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ga bzhugs so// de na
219b6(mdo): sngon gyi dus kyi che/ dge slong dag sbyan ba ser po'i nad kyis thebs ste/ lus rid cing lus nyams chung bar gyurd to// bcom ldan 'das spun myi mnga' zhing gnod pa myed la/ snyun gis btab pa myed de/ stobs dang
219b7(mdo): ldan no// de nas dge' slong rnams kyis de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge' slong kha cig ni stond kyi nad skya rbab ser pos thebs te/ sus rid cing lus nyams chung bar gyur // bco
219b8(mdo): ldan 'das ni snyun myi mnga' zhing gnod pa ma mchis te/ stobs dang ldan zhing rang bzhin gyis snyun myi mnga' la/ pho ba'i drod snyoms shing 'ju ba dang ldan pa la gzigs// bka' saHyad pa/ dge' slong dag
219b9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis/ sngon che rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon gyi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing sachags pas na/ nga nyid
220a1(mdo): kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag du gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par gyi/
220a2(mdo): 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / rtse'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par myi 'gyur te// las dge ba dang kyi dge' 'byas shing bsajugs pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched nam/
220a3(mdo): 'ba' gag la nam par phyin pa ra 'gyur ro// sus can dag gis sa rnam pa ni/ bzlasad pa brgyad sa brgyad kyis/ tshogs zhing dus pa bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du sbyi nang par 'gyur// dge' slong dag sngon byung ba 'a
220a4(mdo): pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba man mid/ rgyal po pad ma zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ringal 'byor pa dang / nus pa dang / bdel ba dang / so legs pa dang / skye bo dang / myi mang pos gang ba dang / 'chang/
220a5(mdo): pa dang / chod pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ke dang / nad nams myed pa dang / 'bras pa/ su dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par
220a6(mdo): 'dug ste/ gnod pa myed ci thams bkrugs pa/ bun byab bzhin du/ rgyas srid baphru ma ma/ rgyam ma yang dad pa ldan pa/ dgel zhing bsas pa 'a'ang bya/ bdag sa man pa
220a7(mdo): gzhadas phan pas zhugs pa/ snyi rjeb bdan nyid mes/ chos 'dod pa/ skye bus mas cad sbyin pa/ thams cad yongs su gtong la/ chags pa byed par yongs su gtong la/ gtong mtshan
220a8(mdo): po la gnas pa zhig go// de'i che ba ran sir/ dus dang nus tshigs ma snyoms pa las/ kyi nad chen po byung ste/ sems can phal cher skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab po// de nas rgyal pos de dag ma
220a9(mdo): nas snying rje bskyed de// bdag gis 'di dag yongs su bsrub par bya zhing / gam par bya'o snyam mo// de nas sul thams cad na sman pa 'khod nams bskus te bsgonas/ sems can de dag gi nad gzhi
220b1(mdo): gnas dang / snga nas gzhi yod par rtogs nas/ de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyis gso ba dang / sman thams cad slu ba byas so// de nas gsos ste/ nor dang sman dang / nag g.yog dang ldan par byas kyang
220b2(mdo): yun ring mo zhig lon gyi bar du sems can de dag gso ma nus so// de nas rgyal pos smand pa thams cad bkug ste/ gus par byas nas/ kye ci'i phyir sems can 'di dag gso dga' bar gyur ces smras so//
220b3(mdo): de nas smand pa rnams kyis dpyad de yon tan dang nyes pa gros mthun par gsol pa/ lha dus ma snyoms pa dang / khams ma snyoms pa las gyurd pa lags pas/ legs par ma rtogs mod kyi lha'o kyang
220b4(mdo): spyan sna cig mchis te/ nya ro hi ta zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis pa da gal te nye na ni des gso bar nus lags so// de nas rgyal po da nya ro ga ti kund tu tshol ba la zhugs te/ des tshol ba'i myi mang
220b5(mdo): po bkye nas/ btsal kyang ma rnyed do// de nas de dag gis rgya la po la gsold to// de nas de'i phyi zhig na rgyal po 'chag tu gshegs pa dang / nang pa de dag kyang gcig tu 'dus te 'khod
220b6(mdo): nas rgyal po la gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag cag nad 'di las yongs su skyab cing srog gsal du gsol// de nas rgyal po nad pa rnams kyi snying rje rje skad zer zhing / sdug sdug skad zer la
220b7(mdo): gti zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas/ snying rjes snying bskyod de/ mchi ma 'dzag cing du bzhin phyung nas/ bsams pa/ bdag gis gzhan dag sdug bsngal gyis gzi rid pa rnams zhi bar byed kyang ma nus na/ bdag gi
220b8(mdo): 'tsho ba 'di lta bu dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'di khrob mi dgos snyam mo// de snyam du bsams nas/ rgyal po sa nor phal po che yongs su gtong ba byas te/ bu thu bo rgyal srid du bcug nas/ nye du dang / skye bom
220b9(mdo): la nyes pa bshags te/ pho brang 'khor gyi gyi dang / blon po rnams la bstod nas/ nad pa sdug pa rnams dbugs phyung ste/ brtul zhugs yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par blangs nas/ khang bzangs kyi snying du
221a1(mdo): song ste/ bdug pa dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa rnams tor nas/ shar phyogs su kha ltas ste/ smon lam btab pa/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can
221a2(mdo): rnams shi nang tu 'phongs par gyur te// nad kyis yongs su gzhi rang pa mthong nas/ bdag gis rang gi srog 'phangs pa yongs su btang ba'i 'den pa dang / bden pa'i tshig 'dis bdag chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du/ 18
221a3(mdo): si tang skye bar shog she ce smras nas/ khang bzangs kyi steng nas bdag nyid kyis mchongs so// der srung ba'i thongs shi nas chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du nya bo che ro gi ta zhes bya bar skyes so// de nas lnga rnams kyis yul
221a4(mdo): thams cad du/ chu klung bzlog byed kyi nang du nya bo che po hi ta zhes bya ba skyes pra re ni/ nad chabs chen pos gzir nas/ yun ring du lon pa rnams kyi ba dung ci dang 'dra'o zhes sgra spogs so// de nas zos ma thag tu skye
221a5(mdo): bo phal po ches lag na mtshon ma thogs nas/ stonod pa khyer te dod/ nas/ nya de gsod por mtshon mnon po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sha rnams gcod pa la zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'
221a6(mdo): des de ltar lus gcod pan/ sems can de dgas thams pakhyab par byas nam/ gnongs mi mthon mo 'angag / rnam 'ams pa/ bdag gi ga khrag gis sems can 'di dag bde bar
221a7(mdo): ba 'dzin// bdag gi sa rnyed pa segs par rnyed de rnam so// des bu'i dus kyis/ so bcwa gnyis kyi bdudu rang gis blan zhes sems can thams cad tshim par byas te/ blu myed pa lda ngag par rdzog pa'i byang chub
221a8(mdo): kyang sems ma log go// ga gi sems cadan de dag gi ni zhi bar gyu da pa de'i tshe/ nyam cher ba ti sa bzlam pa/ kyimam can byed rtsod cig/ ngan rgyam po pad ma ste bya ba de sI te/ dra byed kyi dod tu rang ni phran mA mu 'am
221a9(mdo): bahA/ lus 'di lta bu blangs pa yI gyis/ nga la seMs dag pa kri shig dang // gang gi ched bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ de'i tshe yang
221b1(mdo): khyed nad las gtan tu yongs su tha dad par byas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang / bde ba la dgod par bya'o khri byas so// de skad thos nas/ skye bo'i tshogs de dag dang / rgyal po dang
221b2(mdo): blon po dang / pho brang 'khor 'khor gyi myi rnams kyis dad pa rnyed de/ me tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dag gis mchod pa byas nA/ smon lam btab pa/ shi nad tu dka' ba byed pa/ khyod gang gi tshe bla na myed
221b3(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag cag khyod kyi nyan thos su gyur da cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ dge' slong dag ji snyam du seMs
221b4(mdo): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po pad ma zhes bya bar gyur pa'i gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba byas pa des na nga 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe bde ba mtha' yas pa nyams su myong
221b5(mdo): bar gyurd la/ da ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya/ nga chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na yang / pho ba'i drod s+ho// mas shing / 'ju ba dang ldan te/ des da ngas zos pa dang /
221b6(mdo): 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde' bar zhu bar 'gyur te/ nga nad myed cing gnod pa myed la nad mye da pa'i rang bzhin can tu gyur da to// dge slong dag de bas na 'di
221b7(mdo): ltar bslab par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la snying rje bsgom par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHla nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs ste
221b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / kham re zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
221b9(mdo): pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / chang dpan rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' sdi
222a1(mdo): rnams dang / myi'am mirnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ tha mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
222a2(mdo): nam mkha' lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan
222a3(mdo): dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
222a4(mdo): de bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' saHla pa dgel slong dag gal te ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/ du sbyin pa'i mgo sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smyid pa yang shes pa bzhin
222a5(mdo): chu/ sems can rnams kyis kyang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu shes la sbyin pa'i bkro bzhi'i 'bras bu rnam par smind par yang shes su / zin na ni// de ltar kham kyi tha ma dang / kham gyi 'dug lus
222a6(mdo): pa gang yin pa de las kyang / gal te yon gnas len pa po rnyed na de sa ma byin nam/ bko ba sha ma byas kyi bar du za bar myi byed la/ de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas/ kun nas bkris shing
222a7(mdo): 'dug par myi 'gyur ba zhig na/ ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/ sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par sbyind pa yang shes bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang myi shes la
222a8(mdo): sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par sbyin pa yang myi shes pas na/ de'i phyir de dag ni kun tu 'dzind pa'i sems kyis ma byin pa'am/ bgo bsha' ma byas par za bar byed la/ de dag gi sems kyang / ser sna skyes
222a9(mdo): pas kun nas bkres shing 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ gzhan yang stond pas 'di skad ces bka' matal da te/ bgo bsha' dag
222b1(mdo): nim rnabang sbyin/ ji sa do can 'gyur ba de// drang srong chen pos gsungs pa bzhin// sems can rnams kyis zhes na ni/ ma byin bdun gyi bzhing // sems can tu myi 'gyuras/ de dag kun tu 'dzin par
222b2(mdo): sems// nams kyang skye bar gyi 'gyur da// gang phyir byis pa gti mug gis// bsgribs pa rnams kyis ma shes pa// de phyir kunab tu 'dzin sems kyis// rtag tu ma byin pa bar byed// de dag ser sna skyes
222b3(mdo): nas kyang // sems ni kun nas bkris shing 'dug/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ de'i tshe/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
222b4(mdo): zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i sngags pa ya du bka' saNal da sa// sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par sbyind pa yang bka' saHsad pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// btsu
222b5(mdo): 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa// dge slong dag de bzhin gsheg sa pa sbyin pa'i sngags pa yang brjod la/ sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i/ 'bras bu rnam par smyind pa yang brjod pa 'di lta la/ do ma
222b6(mdo): che ba ci yod// ngas 'das pa'i dus na slong ba'i phyir/ bdag za ba'i kham khar 'ongs zind pa las kyang yongs su gtang ba de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dge'
222b7(mdo): slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba ra na si na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de// de'i ringal 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / le logs pa dang / skye bo mang pos gang
222b8(mdo): phod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams myed pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ga yang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/
222b9(mdo): gnod pa myed cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu cig pa la byams pa bzhin du/ rgyal srid bskyangs so// rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la
223a1(mdo): zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgus byams pa/ thams cad sbyin pa/ thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa myed par yongs su gtong ba/ gtong ba chen/
223a2(mdo): pa la gnas pa zhig go// phyis re shig na mu ke'i skal pa dang 'dra' bar mu ge chen po byung ngo // de nas skye bo'i tshogs mu ge'i dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'jigs pa/ bkres shing skom pa dang / 'gram pa zhom pa
223a3(mdo): yi dgas kyi sus 'dra ba de dag 'dus shing tshogs la gcig tu 'phungs te/ rgyal po'i thad du dong nas/ rgyal bar gyurd cig/ sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces bstod de// smras pa/ lha bdag cig mu ge'i 'jigs pa 'di
223a4(mdo): las yongs su bskyab cing srog bskyab du gsol zhes byas so// de nas rgyal pos mdzod pa la bos te/ bkra'i mdzod pa/ mdzod na zas dang skom dang / bdag cag dang skye bo'i tshogs 'di rnams chog par
223a5(mdo): yod dam zhes byas so// de zos nas mdzod srungs na re/ ba sa te lha la gsol bar 'chal lo zhes byas so// de nas pachi sa mkhas pa rnams kyis pachis na/ 'di srid bar du yul na
223a6(mdo): 'khod pa thams cad ni ny+dzin bzhin kham re re 'tshal la/ rgyal po no zhal kham gnyis gsol ba mchis so zhes gsol to// de nas rgyal pos skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bos te/ bsko ba/
223a7(mdo): 'o na khyod nyin cig bzhin du/ rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs la/ kham re zos nas deng shig ces byas so// de nas de dag nyin cig bzhin du lhags/ mye re kham re zos nas/ kar dga' bar 'dong bar byed do//
223a8(mdo): de nas bram ze gzhan zhig tshis de'i nang du ma zhen te/ gzhan las gtam thos nas/ rgyal po la spras pa lha cis mdzad par yul mye'i nang du bdag gis zos kyis/ bdag kyang kham cig po de gsol cig ces bya
223a9(mdo): de nas rgyal pos bdag nyid kham gnyis pa ba las/ kham cig bram ze la byin nas/ kham cig ni yul gyi dang thang mnyam par za bar byed do// lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni/ 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'dug ste/
223b1(mdo): 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma yul ba ra na si na rgyal po byed pa de ni shin tu dga' ba byed cing 'dug gis/ de bdag gis bgam par bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis bdag nyid bram ze'i cha lugs su srul/
223b2(mdo): te/ dro la bab pa'i tshe/ rgyal po'i thad du song nas/ rgyal bar gyur da cig/ sku tshe'i ring bar shog shig ces bstod nas/ smras pa/ lha bdag bkres kyis/ lha nyid kyi zhal kham cig po des bdag la phan gdags par gsol
223b3(mdo): de nas rgyal pos rang gi srog yongs su btang bar chad nas snying rjes bdag gi kham cig po de bram ze la byin nas/ srung bar 'dug ste/ de lta bu'i tshul gis/ zhag drug gi bar du zan bcad do// 'on kyang skye bo phal po che de
223b4(mdo): dag zan za ba mthong nas/ mchog tu dga' bar sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rgyal po de shi na tu dga' ba byed pa mthong nas/ bram ze'i cha lugs kyi sdang bar byas te/ rang gi gzus
223b5(mdo): su 'dug nas/ rgyal po la bstod pa/ rgyal po chen po legs so mnyes so// khyod dga' ba la zhugs pa 'dis bdag dga' bar gyur to// skye dgu skyong ba 'di lta bu yod pa las na/ skye bo'i
223b6(mdo): 'di dag ni mgon yod pa yin no// nga sa bon thams cad thob cig ces yul phyogs su skos shig dang / bdag gis zhag bdun na gang gis 'bru rnams rgyal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char dbab pa
223b7(mdo): bya'o zhes byas so// rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du byed du bcug go// rgya byin gyis kyang de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char phab ste/ des na mu ge de zlog ste/ lo legs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sargyas
223b8(mdo): pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de ni de'i dus na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyurd pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas de lta bu'i mu ke byung ba na yang / rang gi srog yongs su btang ste/ de lta bu'i sbyin pa
223b9(mdo): dag byin no// dge slong dag de bas na/ 'di ltar bslab par byas te/ sbyin pa dag sbyin no// bsod nams dag bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
224a1(mdo): bcal nas/ dge slong dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / chos skyong zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
224a2(mdo): rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /

224a4(mdo): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
224a5(mdo): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong na mas brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po 'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/ rten
224a6(mdo): cing bzhugs so// gang gi tshe thun po lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das bkrongs pa'i phyir/ glang po che nor skyong yang btang / dug gi/ phye mas kyang gtor gshed ma'i myi yang bkye ste/ de bcom ldan
224a7(mdo): 'das la yun ring po nas gshed ma dang / dgra dang myi mja' bar gyur da la// bcom ldan 'das ni de sa byams pa'i dgongs pa dang / shugs le ba'i dgongs pas/ nye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dge' slo
224a8(mdo): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lhas byin 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das bkrongs pa'i slad du bzhon par bgyid la/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'di la byams pa'i dgongs pa dang
224a9(mdo): phan pa'i dgongs pa dang / thugs phye ba'i dgongs pas nye bar gnas pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral
224b1(mdo): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dond pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams
224b2(mdo): cad mkhyend pa/ ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' ma rnyes zi nad pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod// 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti muka dang bcas pa na/ na ga/
224b3(mdo): pa'i che/ gsod du 'ongs pa na yang / ngas 'di la sems sdang ba ma byas pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// dge' slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bar na sem
224b4(mdo): rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ringal 'byor da pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / myi mang pos yong su gapad 'thab pa dang / chod pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug
