254a5(mdo): mo dag bdag sgom mo zhes zer ba zos so// de nas gnas gtan mo chu 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ yi dgas mo de mthong nam/ dris pa khyod kyis las ci byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug snga
254a6(mdo): dag myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar da ba da sgron ma myi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'dra 'dod zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung stond par 'gyur ro//
254a7(mdo): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba des song ste// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ sbrang bu'i spang
254a8(mdo): me sgrol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cig ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams myi g.yol bar bcom ldan 'das las/ chos mo dang ldan no cog nyand par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas
254a9(mdo): bcim ldan 'das rnams ni gsong 'i gsung sa/ ldan par gsung ba tsu shog 'angs la legs so// shes gsu ma ze rje lum pa yin te/ ri mam ldan 'das kyim sems cad pa man 'anas
254b1(mdo): chen po la 'di skad ces bka' sa yang to// mo zhu 'gal gyi khu chur zhog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod gdod ga las 'ongs pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus gso lang pa / btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas kyi nas tu ni n+de/
254b2(mdo): mchi'i pa las/ slar mar+thi ste/ der bdag gis der yi dgas mo lto na ri tsam las kha ni khab kyi byig tsam ste/ rang gi sgras g.yog pa/ gcer bar mchis shing nyam za ka pa'i skad 'byi nad te// stug sngal dra/
254b3(mdo): pa dang / myi bzad pa dang / cha ba dang yid du myi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so// yang gsol pa/ lus che ri bo mthon po 'dra' ba la// mchu dang tog ma skam zhi shi nad tu sdug
254b4(mdo): rang gi skas ni gdong g.yogs gcer bar mchis// mchu' sgo phra khab myig 'dra rab tu ring // de ltar lcer bur sgras g.yogs pa// nus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin// zod pa thogs ni
254b5(mdo): myi bzad la/ du zhing ku nad tu chug par bgyid// brel pa dang nab dub ni sug snga la dag kI nyen/ zag zhad kyang 'byin pa bgyid// ug sA la sngo ba nye su myong // de'is kyi 'i 'jig rten du// rab 'jig sdig pa ci bgyis na// des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dras
254b6(mdo): 'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'amachal da pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni/ sdig pa'i la sa byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyand par 'dod de
254b7(mdo): btsun pa nyand par 'tshal lags so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'o nA legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang
254b8(mdo): po'i di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa
254b9(mdo): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed palha dang myi rnams kyi stond pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rte nad tu byung ste// de grong khyer ba ra na si na/ drang srong smra ba
256a1(mdo): ri dgas kyi gnas na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas grong khyer ba na pi des khyim bdag cig gi chung ma sed snga can 'dungs pa// yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzind pa khA la yang rtor ma myi stem na/
256a2(mdo): slong ba gzhan dag lta la spros kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod de/ de dge slong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa dag mthong na// sems kyis sdang bar byed do// re zhig na bsod snyoms bzhi
256a3(mdo): de'i khyim du 'ongs nas/ des de mthong nas ser sna skyes te/ sems kyang ldang bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis 'di la bkur nyi man ni// 'di phyis kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de
256a4(mdo): nas sdig can des me khyi ma'i sdug pa lung du bsad nas/ dge slong de nang nu thos te/ sgo bcar nas spyad du bcug go// ma du sa pa myos te// dge slong khyod sa bkur bsti ma yin pa byas pa 'a
256a5(mdo): min gyis/ byin cad khyim 'di la 'o zhis ces byas so// de nas de sar+ya sna kudang tu bsten kyi snyoms te/ mang d+ha rgyas pa des/ yi dgas su skyes te// de lta bu'i sdug bsngas
256a6(mdo): nyams su myong ngo // mo'u 'gal ki bu de bsan/ tsinayo dgas yo mnyes pa gang yin pa de la bu lta bu dag rgya 'ong 'a bya ba'i phyir/ ser sna spong ba la brtson par bya'o// btsam/
256a7(mdo): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' ba la nas/ med nga ldan pa mo'u 'gas kyi bu dang das ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gyi 'am ni dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang mi rang ste/ bcom ldan
256a8(mdo): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / mu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
256a9(mdo): pho zang 'khor gyi gyi rnams dang / mong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / skarnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin nams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / rgya
256b1(mdo): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang /
256b2(mdo): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa// rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gi bu chen po
256b3(mdo): yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing song ba dang / yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg 'dra ba la/ rang gi sgras g.yogs pa/ lto na ra tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi myig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/
256b4(mdo): mye lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin ya skom gyis gdungs te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / myi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / des
256b5(mdo): mthong ba tsam gyis/ chu klung dang / khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe char 'bra pa de'i / de'i steng du me stag 'phrog chu d+hU pa'i me dag ma'i char 'bab pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
256b6(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal ki bu chen pos de la spras pakye khyod kyis sdig pa ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing ba d+h+r-i ka kayi dgas mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
256b7(mdo): po/ bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus zhig dang / de rdzol bdag gis las kyi rnam pa stond par 'gyur te// de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang / sdis pa'i las
256b8(mdo): spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams/ laM sbrang bu'i sna
256b9(mdo): na skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog stond te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams myi g.yo' bar// bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do// de nas sadzes rgyas bcom
257a1(mdo): ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba/ chur shoka 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba/ sngar 'dzum pa yin te// der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad
257a2(mdo): ces bka' sa la to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chutshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs// mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pas/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi
257a3(mdo): pa las slar mchis te der bdag gis yi dgas mo sdong po mye reg ma 'dra la rang gi sras g.yog pa/ sto ni ri rab tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi myig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me'o/
257a4(mdo): gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam zag pa'i skad 'byin paskom gyis gdungs te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / myi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba tshu myong de mthong bcas gan
257a5(mdo): chu klung dang / khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi che char 'bab pa de'i tshe/ de'i steng du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag/ ma'i char 'bab pa la zhig mthong lags so// bcom ldan
257a6(mdo): kyis bka' saHla da pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa byed sde pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nya nad par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'o na legs pa
257a7(mdo): nyon la yid la zung shig dngangs bshad do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
257a8(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na myed pa/ sgra dang myi rnams kyi stonang pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
257a9(mdo): ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de grong khyer ba ran si na/ drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi gnas na rten cing bzhugs pa na/ de dge slong zhig lam du zhugs nas/ de skom gyis gdungs
257b1(mdo): khron pa'i drung du song nas/ de na bu mo zhig bum pa chus bkang ste 'dug pa la/ dge slong des smi pa/ che zhe bdag ni skom gyis gdungs kyis chu byin cig ces byas nas yo byad la kund tu 'dzi nad pa de/ ser sna
257b2(mdo): skyes nas/ dge slong de la smras pa/ dge slong bdag gi bum pa 'gribs su 'ongags// n-i snang chu myi sbyin no zhes byas so// de nas dge' slong skom gyis gdungs bzhin du re zag bcad nas song
257b3(mdo): de nas bu mo de ser sna kun tu na snyoms te/ mang du byas pa de lta bus kau nas yi dgas su skyesaste bu'i sdug bsngal drag pa dang / myi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug go//
257b4(mdo): mo'u 'gal gi bu de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ser sna spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o/ shes/ me'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHsa
257b5(mdo): nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / rnam mA kha' lding dang myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye/ chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
257b6(mdo): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bathog phyis snod kyi bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi phyi
257b7(mdo): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin nams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phyen
257b8(mdo): po rnams kyis bkur bstir byu bla yA bya'o/ mor byas mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi' ma ni deng/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
257b9(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge la 'dun dang bcas pa/
258a1(mdo): rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la sod nas/ rgyal po'i rab tu bsod snyoms byas te/ zan thos nas/ zas phyis lend pa spangs te/ lung zed dang chos gos bzhag ste/ byan/
258a2(mdo): phung po'i rig la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dzegs te/ nyon par gnas pa'i phyir/ shing zhig gi drung tu rten cing bzhugs so// de nas me dang ldan pa mo'u 'gas kyi bu chen pos
258a3(mdo): yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg 'dra ya/ gcer bur 'dug cing / rang gi sgras g.yog pa/ ston ring ba tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi myig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kund tu rab tu 'bar te// mye
258a4(mdo): gcig tu 'bar mas tshig cing nyam zag pa'i smad 'byin dag/ mug bsngal drag pa dang / spyi bzang pa dang / chab dang / sidadam+b+hi 'ong ba'i ba 'amyong ba/ gyis bzhin tu drang zhing / mchog
258a5(mdo): tu dring zhing / bas su phyis pa la/ de yang bde blag tu rnyed pa zhig mthong ngo // mthunas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal kyi bu chen po myi dka' bar gyur nas/ yi dgas mo la dris
258a6(mdo): khyod kyis sngon sdig pa ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu 'amyong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te// sangs rgyas bcom lda
258a7(mdo): 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rna pa lung stond par 'gyur te/ de thos nas sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal kyi/
258a8(mdo): bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ sbrang bu'i skang tshim bskos pas 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan
258a9(mdo): no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang / dbang po rnams myi gsol bar bcom ldan 'das las/ chos yo nga ldan no cog nyand par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsor po
258b1(mdo): gsungs/ snyan par gsung ba/ chu shog 'ongs pa legs ma zhes gsung ba/ sngar 'dzum pa yin te// der bcom ldan 'das kyis me dang ldan pa mo'u 'gas kyi bu la 'di gad ces bka' ba yang to// mo
258b2(mdo): ki zhu chung shog zhungs pa legs mo// khyod da gcod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u 'gal gi zhus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du chu zhing mchis mchi pa las/ der bdag gis yi dgas sngong num
258b3(mdo): mye reg 'dra ba la/ kacer bur mchis shing / rang gi skas g.yog pa/ lton ri rab tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi myig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me s+ye gcig tu 'bar nas
258b4(mdo): tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byind la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / myi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang / khron pa rnams skam par 'gyu
258b5(mdo): ba dang / ka ging tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe/ de'i steng du me staka 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa dang / phyi sa bzhin du dri ngazhi nga/ mchog tu dri nga ba zas su phyis 'tshal la/ de yang bde
258b6(mdo): thag tu myi brnyed pa zhig mthong lags so// yang gsol da nyam pag skad kyang 'byind par bgyid// sdug bsngal tshor ba mas su myong // gang na phyi sa'i gnas yod par// der ni
258b7(mdo): sdug bzhini rgyug par bgyid// phyi sa bza' ma btung snyam na// de yang bde blag rnyed myi 'gyur// de'i sa myi'i 'jig rtend tu/ sdig pa rab 'jigs ci bgyis na/ des na sdig pa 'di 'dra ba/ 'jigs su
258b8(mdo): rung ba nyams su myong / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam// btsun pa nyan par 'tshal
258b9(mdo): lags so// mo'u 'gal gi bu 'o na legs par nyon la yi la zung shig dang ras bshad do// mo'u 'gal gi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba ra na se na/ rang sangs rgyas sdug cing 'phros
259a1(mdo): pa la snying che ba bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba zhig yod la// de yang nad bu can zhig ste/ ba ra sir bsod snyoms la song ngo // re shig na de la sman pas mthun pa'i zas bstan
259a2(mdo): nas/ de tshong dpon zhig ka la 'dug pa der song ba dang / tshong dpon des kyang mthong nas/ dris pa 'phags pa khyod ci bzhed// des spras pa/ 'thun pa'i kha zas 'dod do// de nas tshong dpon des 'phags pa
259a3(mdo): la kha zas 'thun pa yul cig ces mna' ma la bsgo'o// de nas de'i yan lam ser sna skyes te/ kal te bdag gis depa 'di la kha zas byin du zin na/ sang yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ phyogs gcig tu
259a4(mdo): song ste/ srung zed phyi sas bkang nas/ steng 'bras 'acan sa bkab nas/ rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo// nyan thos da rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong
259a5(mdo): myi 'jug ste/ des blangs so// blangs nas tshor te/ 'dra dring ba las na 'dis phyims bkang go ma chag snyam mo// de nas bdag nyid chen po des/ de ka zhig tu bor nas song ngo //
259a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sacal pa// mo'u 'gal gyi bu ji snyam du sems/ de de'i nus mtshong dpon gyi mna' bar gyu rad pa gang yaM na ba de ni/ yi dgas mo 'di yin te/ des sdig pa'i las de
259a7(mdo): sta bu byas nas/ de byin cad rtag d+ha sems can dmyal ba dang / cud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams su skyes te/ rtag tu bas su byis za bar gyur to// so'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na/ ser sna spang ba la ba
259a8(mdo): bar byaste/ cinapa yi dgas ma de'i nyes pa de la bu dag 'ong bar kyi 'byur ba de lta pa mi chu 'gal kyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bca yang nas/ me nga ldan pa
259a9(mdo): mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / lha dang / ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye' chen po sa ba sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
259b1(mdo): mngon par bstod do// / mo'u 'gal gyi bu zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
259b2(mdo): dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi
259b3(mdo): 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nas
259b4(mdo): mkha' lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
259b5(mdo): gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan zos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pargyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i
259b6(mdo): che rgyal po'i khab kyi ni pha rol da 'od ma'i tshal gyi na tshu rol de'i bar skabs na/ yi dgas sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la kacer bur 'dug cing / rang gi skas g.yog pa/ lto na ri tsam
259b7(mdo): la kha na khab kyi myig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu 'bar te// mye rtse gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyams zag pa'i skad 'byind la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / myi bzad pa dang / cha ba dang /
259b8(mdo): yid du myi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba lnga brgya khwa khyus lding ba bzhin du nam la 'khor te/ gang du yang 'dugs myi rnyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos
259b9(mdo): bgos te/ lhung zed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la song ba dang / des yi dgas de dag mthong ngo // yi dgas de dag mthong ngo // yi dgas de dag gis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
260a1(mdo): ka bu chen po mthong // de nas de dag gcig tu 'dril nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po thad du song ste phyi nang nas// snying rje rje skad du zer zhing / sdug sdug skad zer la
260a2(mdo): gti zhing smra bas tshig mthun par spras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu bdag cag ni rgyal po'i kheb du tshong dpon lnga brgyar gyurd te// bdag cag ser sna can 'jungs pa/ yo byad rnams la kund tu 'dzin pa
260a3(mdo): gyu rad nas/ bdag cag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa ma byin la/ gzhan dag la sbyin pa byed pa la yang brtsegs byas so// sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la yang / yi dgas kyi tshig lta bus mang du myos te/ khyod ni yi //
260a4(mdo): su skyes pa bzhin du/ gzhan gyi khyim gyi nyug pa'o zhes byas so// de nas bdag cag zhi ba'i 'og tu 'di lta bu'i yi dgas su skyes so// btsun pa mo'u 'gas kyi bu chen po de bas na ba /
260a5(mdo): cag gi nye nurgyal po'i khab gnas pa de dag la// bdag cag gi las kyi rnam pa shes par mdzod la/ dad pa dris te/ sangs rgyas la tshogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gso
260a6(mdo): gsol nas bdag gi slad du yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig/ 'on tang bdag cag yi dgas kyi skye gnas nas thar kyang / srid do zhes gsungs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
260a7(mdo): bus kyang yi dgas rnams la cang myi gsung bas khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus/ de dag gi nye du rnams khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas// phyid nyin sangs rgyas la sotshogs pa/ dge slong
260a8(mdo): gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs so// yi dgas rnams la yang sman te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong ka dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bshos la gyan drangs kyis khyed kyang de gshegs shig ces byas so//
260a9(mdo): de dag gi nye du rnams la yang khyed kyang gshegs shig dang / nye ru'i mchod stond byed pa der yi dgas de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu nyid mchod ston ka zhal ta byed
260b1(mdo): la zhugs so// de nas nam nangs zhal zas bshams te/ gdugs chod la bab na/ yi dgas de dag myi sdang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gi bu chen pos/ lha'i myig ki sa yi dkas de dag bsams na
260b2(mdo): yul ma ka da zo thag na yang mying la mtha rad kyis chen po bzhi pa'i bar du bltas na yang den yang myi sdang ngo // de nas ji srid du de'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa de srid du bltas kyang / de na yang myi srid do// de nas ched
260b3(mdo): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po myi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams myi gda' lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa
260b4(mdo): mo'u 'gal gyi bu thong la khyod myi dga' ba ma byed cig/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed pa dag yod de// de dag tu las kyi rlung gis
260b5(mdo): 'phangs mod kyi/ 'od kyang mo'u 'gas kyi bu deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la ltos shig// thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mngon par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrus
260b6(mdo): murnam par 'phrul pa yang bstan kyisa'agan de drangs shig/ de nas 'gan de rungs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyang 'dus yi dgas kyi nye du nams kyang 'dus/ midag sa mthong por 'dod ma
260b7(mdo): sems cad ka' dag kyangs pa sa zhugs te 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnas mi dgas rnams kyis/ sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das nya thos kyi dge 'du dang sa pa/ bgos gapos
260b8(mdo): pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi phyir nye nu rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas la batshogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing 'khod do snyam du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to//
260b9(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag drug dang ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs// sbyin pa 'di'i bsod nams gang // de 'i yi dgas phyi bzhin song // yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jig sa las/
261a1(mdo): de dag myur tu tha ra gyur da cig ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi las brtend te/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bstand te/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag tu/
261a2(mdo): mas ser sna'i dri ma spangs te/ bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to// shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por/ skyes
261a3(mdo): so// lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lo nad pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas yi dgas las
261a4(mdo): shi 'phos pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang po skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo // de na sngo yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i
261a5(mdo): bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te// bdag cag zhag lon te bzo// da// bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba ni bdag cag/ ka cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan
261a6(mdo): 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo// de nas sngon yid gas su gyu rang pa'i lha'i bu/ na mdzub 'khor dag cing mgul pabogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgya nad pa/ nar/
261a7(mdo): bu sna tshogs kyis sbas pa'i cod pan can/ lus kur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma la gtogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang /
261a8(mdo): pad ma dkar po dang / man 'da' ra ba rnams kyis bu bkang ste/ 'od ma'i chal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'khor khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos
261a9(mdo): nyan pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon yi dgas su gyurd pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bka la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su
261b1(mdo): chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstand te/ de thos nas/ yi dgas su gyu rad pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis khyad par chen po thob bo// de dag chod pa khye spogs phyind pa bzhin du gyurd te// bcom ldan 'das la lan
261b2(mdo): gsum bskor ba byas nas/ de nyid du myi snang bar gyur da to// der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pa la bka' sa lad pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis yi dgas mang po dag lha'i nang du
261b3(mdo): bkod nas/ de dag kyang ma dang gsum nga'i thad tu 'ongs te/ de dag la ngas chos bstand nas/ de dag gis rnyed par bya ba rnyed de/ mtho bar 'gyur ba rnyed nas/ dong ba de ni khyod kyis zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yo/
261b4(mdo): par gyur da te/ legs so legs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gi bu chen pos/ de dag nye du rnams la yang shes par byas te/ de dag gis zos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyu rad te// bcom
261b5(mdo): ldan 'das la sems dka' bar gyur da nas/ bkur bsti byas/ so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na/ khyod kyis tsa nas yi dgas de dag gi nyes pa de lta bu dag myi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ ser
261b6(mdo): sna spang ba la batshon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
261b7(mdo): lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po las rtogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / chu smad ces bya ba ni/
261b8(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
261b9(mdo): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod
262a1(mdo): byas te/ lga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
262a2(mdo): rnams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / nas zas dang / gzims cha dang / kadad dang / mun gsos dang / smad zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khaban 'od ma'i cha
262a3(mdo): bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ra tend cing bzhugs so// de'i ma rgyal po'i khab gi grong khyer na/ tshong dpon phyug ci ma no mapal longs khyod che la/ yongs su 'dzind pa rgya che zhing yangs pa/ nam thos kyi bu 'i na
262a4(mdo): dang ldan pa/ nam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas bdes rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te// de de dang ldan cig tu che zhing dka' la/ dka' mgur myod do// che zhing dka'
262a5(mdo): ya dka' mgur pyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dku lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u zhig/ btsas ste/ de btsas pa'i btsas stond rgyas par byas te/
262a6(mdo): 'di'i mying ci skad 'dogs shes mying 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rnam skar chu smad la bcas pas na/ de'i phyir mying chu smad ces gdags so// zhes zer nas/ de'i phyir mying chu smad
262a7(mdo): ces btags so// de nas khye'u chu smad bskyed bsrings te/ cher skyes te de'i pha shi ba dang / rang gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to// de nas des tshong dus bkram nas/ nyo tshong byed cing / nyo tshong gis 'tsho bar byed pa
262a8(mdo): las/ de nyin cig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zad du song ste/ de bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos thos pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la dad par gyur nas/ de rab tu byung ba'i sems
262a9(mdo): skyes te// des ma la gsol ba btab pa/ yum bdam bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la rab tu byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig/ de nas de'i mes smras pa/ bu khyod ni bu cig pa yin gyis// bdag ji srid
262b1(mdo): 'tsho ba'i bar du rab tu ma byung zhig/ bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ni bya byos shig ces zer ro// chu smad des kyang ci rnyed pa de dag thams cad ma la byin te/ yum 'dis dge la sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa da
262b2(mdo): bkren pa rnams la sbyin bdag gis shig ces byas so// de'i ma de ni brkam chags can 'jungs pa yo byad thams cad kund tu 'dzind pa zhig ste/ kar sha pa ni dag spangs nas/ dge slong dang / bram ze gang dag zas
262b3(mdo): 'dod de khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rga zhing / khyed ni yi dgas su skyes pa bzhin du/ khyim phyi nyug cing slong ngo zhes zer ro// bu de la yang slu bar byed de/ bdag gis nyin cig bzhin du dge slong 'di snyed cig la zan sbyin
262b4(mdo): zhes zer ro// phyis re shig na de shi pe dang / yi dgas su skyes nas/ bu chu smad ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed de// sbyin padag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la rab tu byung ngo //
262b5(mdo): des bathon pa dang bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas/ phol myig lnga pa li 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing myi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par thA/
262b6(mdo): ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par chad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bra
262b7(mdo): bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong par mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil tu 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan spangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur da pa/ reg pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang /
262b8(mdo): mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la myi blta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha'i rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang
262b9(mdo): gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur da nas/ des chu rlung gang 'ga'i 'gram du lo ma'i skyil po byas te/ bsam gtan byed de// de'i ma yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa de yang / sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la/ gcer
263a1(mdo): bur 'dug cing rang gi sgras ka yogos pa/ ston mitsam la/ kha ni khab kyi myig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kund tu rab tu 'bar te/ mye lce cig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam zag pa'i skang
263a2(mdo): 'byind te/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyi mang du song nas/ re shig na tshe dang ldan pa chu sprad kyis/ yi dgas mo de mthong nas dris pa/ 'di kho na 'dra ba su khyod su zhig/ yi dgas mos smras pa// bu cig gapa las bca
263a3(mdo): pa'i byams pa'i ma ni bdag yin te/ zas dang skom dang bral ba'i// yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skyes/ bdag ni shi ba'i dus 'das nas// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lo nad te// chu'i bag kyang ma mthong na// kha zas
263a4(mdo): zhig g.yas mthong // 'bras bur ldan pa'i shing rnams kyi// drung song de dag 'bras myed 'gyur// gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag so yang // de dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur// btsun pa'i shing drung bde ba lags
263a5(mdo): khyod ni snod nang rgyu nang chu yang bsil// bkren pa bdag la thugs/ rje skyed// skom kyis gdungs kyis chab gsol dacig/ den/ bu chu smad kyis ma la smras pa// yum khyod myi gyu rang pa'i tshe
263a6(mdo): bdag gis sbyi ba dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag byed dum gas// yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu cig bdag ni me sngas non bas/ sbyin 'dag kyang ma byin// bsod nams dag kyang ma
263a7(mdo): te/ nor rnyed pa de dag thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sbas so// bu cig de bas na dad pa dris la// bdag gi phyir sangs rgyas la babatsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas// yon gyi rabs 'ad
263a8(mdo): par gsol da cig// 'on tang bdag yi dgas kyi skye gnas nas tha rad kyang srid do// chu smad kyis smras pa/ de ltar bgyis khyod kyang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug shig// yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu cig bdag ni gan+de
263a9(mdo): bur 'dug pas ngo tsha te ngos kyi thub po// chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa byed pa de'i tshe ngo myi chan/ da ltar 'bras bu myong ba'i che ci ngo tsha// yi dgas mos smras pa/ 'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o//
263b1(mdo): de nas chu spyad kyis nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas/ byid nyid sangs rgyas la rdzogs pa/ dge' slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol la spyan drangs nas/ gdugs chod la bab pa na/ sangs rgyas las bson/
263b2(mdo): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag kyang 'dus/ yi dgas e dwe yang gral dpon gi mdun du 'dug ste/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dug pa rnams kyis yi dgas mo de mthong ngo // yi dgas mo de mi lu sa myi sdug cing /
263b3(mdo): mthong nas shin tu skyo ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyurd to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas la sosogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas
263b4(mdo): yi dgas mo'i phyir yon gyi ribs 'dond par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas/ sbyin ba'i rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa'i de'i bsod nams gang //
263b5(mdo): de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin song // yi dgas 'jigs rten rab la / jigs las// de ni myur tu thar da gyur da cig ces gsungs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten nas/ yi
263b6(mdo): dgas mo de dang / skye bo mang po la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te// srog chags 'bum phrag du mas de mthong nas/ bden pa ma zod par gyur da to// yi dgas mo de yang sems dga' bar gyur/
263b7(mdo): shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so// tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis kyang / yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes par shes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum da ni mthu yod kyis sbyin pa yongs
263b8(mdo): su btang ba dag gis shig// yi dkas rdzu 'phrul chen pos smras pa/ bu cig bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' ba myed de/ myi nus so de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mo la zhus pa/ chasa?/
263b9(mdo): pa'i mun pas myig ni rab bsgribs te// khyod kyis yi dgas 'jig rten bsgrubs pa'o// khyod kyi rus bu chen pog myed pa// rus pa pags pa spyi rnams da dung 'dug ces byas so// de nas tshe dang
264a1(mdo): snyun pa chu skad kyis lan mang du myos te// smras nas de'i 'og tu de las dathang cig thob bo// de nas chu smad kyis dge 'dun la lus nas/ gang gis dge 'dun las ras zung cig po nyom /
264a2(mdo): dge slong des// gos kyi gdapal bzhag go// de nas yi dgas mo re mtshan po 'ongs nas rkus so// de nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad nas/ chu smad song ste yi dgas mo myos nas
264a3(mdo): phyir bkug ste byin no// de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du/ dge slong de las rkus nas// tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug ste byin pa dang // de bshags nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge la 'dun ni
264a4(mdo): phyir bstan la klan no// de nas des phyin chad ma brkus so// de bas na sems can rnams la de ltar ser snga tho tsam par byed pa mthong nas// ci nas yi dgas mo de la nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar myi 'gyur
264a5(mdo): bar bya ba'i phyir// ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad nas// dge/ slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
264a6(mdo): dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la bas tshotsogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / dmus long zhes
264a7(mdo): bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / zug po rnams dang / pho zab 'khor ki m+b+hi rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
264a8(mdo): nod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkhal lding rnams dang / kyi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkuram bsti byas/ za mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu
264a9(mdo): dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na
264b1(mdo): bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ khyim bdag mgro
264b2(mdo): myed zas sbyin kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos kos bgos te/ lhung zed thogs nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo // mnyan tu
264b3(mdo): yod par bsod snyoms byas nas/ zan zos te/ zas phyis lend pa spangs nas/ lhung zed dang / chos gos bzhag ste/ yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba las/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis/ yi dgas mo
264b4(mdo): sdong dum me reg ma 'dra ba/ dmus long du 'dug pa/ rang gi skyes g.yog pa/ lho ni ri rab cel/ kha ni khab kyi myig tsam ste/ dur khro da du bzhin du dri nga ba/ khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams
264b5(mdo): kyis bskor da nas/ phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing bcad cing za ba dang / de gnad la dbapa ste/ dkos thag nas nyam zag pa'i skad 'byind te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / myi bzad
264b6(mdo): pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed/ myi dga' bar rgyu rad nas dris pa/ srin mo khyab kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig
264b7(mdo): byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ nyi ma sha ra da na sgron ma myi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung
264b8(mdo): stond par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bcom ldan 'das pa der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog sa
264b9(mdo): bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ sbrang bu'i sbrang thi ma skol ba dang / 'dra' ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog stond te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / dbang po rnams myi g.yo bar/ bcom ldan 'das las
265a1(mdo): chos ro dang ldan no cag nyan par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba/ chur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsungs pa/ sngar 'jug
265a2(mdo): pa yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dka' byed la/ 'di skad ces bka' yaHyad pa/ dga' byed tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs// dga' byed kyis gso
265a3(mdo): pa btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te// der bdag gis yi dgas mo sdong dum me re ka a 'dra la/ dmus long du mchis pa rang gi sgras g.yogs pa/ lto ni ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi myig tsam
265a4(mdo): ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dring ba/ zhwa dang / bya rgod dang / 2mas kyis bskor de nas// phyogs kun nas ka kun bkum zhing 'tshal ba de dag de gnad la bab ste/ bkos zag nas/ nyam zag pa'i zhang/
265a5(mdo): 'byind te// sdug bsngal drag pa dang / myi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lakra/ lags so// yang gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra/
265a6(mdo): ba la// mchu dang kog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug pa dang / gi sgras ni gdong g.yogs gcer bar mchis// mchu sgo pra Shab rtsi ga 'dra rab tu ring // de ltar gcer bu smras g.yogs pa/ rus /
265a7(mdo): 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin// thod pa thogs shing myi bzad la// ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid// bkres pa dang ni skom pa'i sa// dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nye nad// nyam zag skad kyang 'byind par
265a8(mdo): bgyid// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong // de'is myi'i 'jig rten du// rab 'jigs sdig pa mi bgyis na// des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur // bcom ldan 'dra/
265a9(mdo): kyis bka' sarba lad pa// dga' byed yi dgas mo de ni// sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyand par 'dod dam// btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// dga' byed 'o na lekra
265b1(mdo): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// skal pa bzang po 'di nyid la// skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
265b2(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas
265b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na si na drang srong smra ba/ ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas grong khyer ba ran si de na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos
265b4(mdo): 'dod de chos thos nas/ 'khor ba las nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan tu blta bar gyur te// des pa ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la rab tu byung ngo // de nas de'i
265b5(mdo): phyir nye du rnams kyis// dge' slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas// de de na slob pa dang myi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang / lhan cig tu gnas pa las re shig na/ des bag myed pa'i dbang
265b6(mdo): gis bslab pa'i gzhis lhod par byas so// de nas dge slong marnams kyis tshul khrims 'tshal pa'i phyir bskrad do// de nas de sa sbyin bdag khyim bdag rnams dad pas nyes par 'dul ba yang
265b7(mdo): gcod du bcug/ slob pa dang myi slob pa'i dge slong rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod// dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa gang yin pa de dag mthong na yang // myig btsums te 'dug go// dka' byed
265b8(mdo): ci snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo 'di yin te// des gtsug lag khang la ser sna byas pa des ni yi dgas su skyes so// des nar ma bcad pa des ni/ khwa dang / bya rgod dang /
265b9(mdo): byi dang / wa rnams kyis bskord to// des slob pa dang myi slob pa rnams kyis bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas ni// de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to// dge' slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na/
266a1(mdo): myig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyu rad to// dga' byed de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par sbyind pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// laH
266a2(mdo): cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smind pa yang gcig tu nges pa dkar lnga 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smind pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dka' byed de bas na las gcig tu res
266a3(mdo): par gnas pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar bu rnams 'bal zhig la gtad par bya ste// dka' byed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs
266a4(mdo): 'di bstan pa na// srog chags sa yas bden pa mthong ba gyur to// der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka'abaNal pa/ dge slong dag ser sna dang / ngag gi nges par gyod/
266a5(mdo): pa'i nges dbyigs de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang rtogs nas/ ser sna dang / ngag gi nyes par gyod pa spang ba'i bathon par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'a
266a6(mdo): kyis de skad ces bka' saHlang nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la tshogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'ad/
266a7(mdo): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / ngo
266a8(mdo): zang 'khor gyi gyi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi'am ci rnams da
266a9(mdo): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te// sta dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang /
266b1(mdo): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams/
266b2(mdo): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa mnyand tu yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug
266b3(mdo): cing nor mang la yong spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de phyi zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //
266b4(mdo): de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgya nad pa/ dpe' byad bzang po pa rgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgya na
266b5(mdo): nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang / bcom/ ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyand pa'i phyi
266b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstand te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las
266b7(mdo): 'das pa la yon tan tu lta bar gyur da te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la rab tu byung nas/ ku nad tu grags pa dang / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ kos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang /
266b8(mdo): spyan dang / nad gsos dang / sman bong rnams brnyes par gyur to// des yongs su bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed do cog brdzogs par byed de// des tshangs par mtshungs par gyod pa rnams la bgo ba sham byas pa/
266b9(mdo): de nas ser sna kund tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas na/ rang gi yo byad la lhag par bzhin bzhin du shi nas rang ga gnas khang du yi dgas su skyes so// de nas de'i tshenas pa mtshungs par gyod pa
267a1(mdo): nams kyis/ 'gan 'di 'dug myed pa brdungs nas nus bu phyir srung ngo // ren ma de'i nus bus/ rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas/ phyir gtsug lag khang du lpags so// de nas gnas khang gi/
267a2(mdo): sgo phye ste/ chos gos dang / lung bad g.yar snga 'dris pa la zhugs pa dang / re shig na yi dgas ka lag dang myig myi lcags/ lus mchog tu 'jigs pa chos gos dang lhung zed zin cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo //
267a3(mdo): de skar myi sdug pa de mthong nas/ dge' slong dag mi dga' bar 'gyur te// bcom ldan 'das su na ma ma // den pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi bu nges pan gdags pa dang / thob ma mchags rnams/
267a4(mdo): skyo ba bskyed pa dang / ser sna'i rngam par smin pa myi sdug pa ya dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gis mdun du bdar te/ gnas der
267a5(mdo): shes so// de ma pas rgyu sa na pa dasus 'asus gnyis kyis legs pa sa rang du/ dbye byung ba' po brgya bul mangs par byal pa /
267a6(mdo): 'od 'dos gang gis brgya dad pa/ nyim stong bas lhag pa'i 'od 'dom gas brgyan dpa/ nyim sbyong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ro bo 'gro ba lta bu'i kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/
267a7(mdo): mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes te/ de ngom par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char spri gi 'brug sgra lta bur zab pa dang / rnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gis yi dgas de myos te/
267a8(mdo): bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis/ bdag nyid phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung zed 'di bsgrubs te/ des na yi dgas su skyes pa yin gyis/ da yang ngal sems dga' bar gas la/ yo byad 'di la yang sems ma
267a9(mdo): chags par byas pa yang legs so// 'di las kyang shi 'phos nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes te/ de nas yi dgas des/ chos kos dang / lhung zed 'dun la phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das
267b1(mdo): gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ nges pa bshags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dgas kyi phyir yon gyi rabs kyi gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di'i bsod nams gang // de'i yi dgas phyi bzhin song / yi dgas
267b2(mdo): 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de ni myur tu thar gyur da cig/ de nas yi dgas de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so// de nas yi dgas rdzu 'phru/
267b3(mdo): chen po/ rna cha rngub 'khor dag cing 'gul ba zhogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgya nad pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spros pa'i cod pan can/ lus kur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sotsog+sa
267b4(mdo): pas byugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / mna'ad ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la
267b5(mdo): da ka gnas pa 'khor khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas/ nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos ma/ nyand pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go//
267b6(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang mthun pa'i cho bstan te// de zos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo // de'i tshe dge' slong srong dang tho rangs myi nyal bar/ brtson 'askur
267b7(mdo): byed pa la gnas pa de dag kis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // de mthong nas the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs/ mdang
267b8(mdo): gsum myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i sla da du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHsad pa/
267b9(mdo): dge slong dag/ myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba pa la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba ma yin ki/ yi dgas de shi nas/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes te/ de
268a1(mdo): mdang gsum pa'i thang tu 'ongs nas/ ras de mtsham bstan te// de dga' ba skyes nas mang // dge slong dag de bsan cinas/ mong dpon las yidags su kya da pa de'i nyes pa lta bu das/
268a2(mdo): byung bar myi 'gyur bar / ser sna snang ba la batshon par bya ste/ dge slong byed kyis de snar bgrub par gyi ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' la yang nas
268a3(mdo): dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / snga ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / rtsi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pa la sortogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
268a4(mdo): bu zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gi phyi rnams dang /

268a7(mdo): kyis mchod cizhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ nabs dang / nas zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong nams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge

268a9(mdo): thogs rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo // rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas nas/ zan zos te/ zan phyis lend pa spangs nas/ chos gos dang lung zed bzhag ste/ yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing
268b1(mdo): song ba dang / bya rgod phung po'i ro'o nyis 'khor du/ yi dgas mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la/ lus khrag gis bgos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug bzhin du/ kyeng nus kyis bskor da pa/ nyin mo dang / mtshan mo
268b2(mdo): bu lnga snga bca zhing / de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yod bzhin du/ de bkres pas nyen nas/ de dag pa zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas gnas btan 'das bu sprin gyi bus de la dri
268b3(mdo): pa/ khyod kyis sngon las ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug/ mi dag sgo smras pa/ nyi ma shar pa na sgron ma byin d+hi bcom ldan 'dra la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam par sbyinang
268b4(mdo): pa lung stond par 'gyur te// de zos nas sems can gzhan du ga kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa' dam bu sbyin gyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song ngo //
268b5(mdo): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ sbrang bu'i sbrang phyi ma bskol ba dang / 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag
268b6(mdo): du ma yang dbang po rnams myi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las tshwa sa ro dang ldan no chog nya nad par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas pacom ldan 'das rnas ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsu
268b7(mdo): ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba/ sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin la bka' saHlad pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa/
268b8(mdo): legs so// khyod gzod ka las 'ongs/ 'dam bus sbyin gyis gsol da pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dgas mo// kashin rje'i sring mo 'dra la
268b9(mdo): lus khrag gis bshos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug pa bzhin du keng rus gis bskor pa zhig mthong lags so// yang gsol da pa/ bdag ni nyin zhing bu lnga btsa la// mtshan yang de bzhin bu lnga btsa la ste/
269a1(mdo): bcas nas de dag sasun yang // 'drangs par gyi 'brum zhes pa smin/ na 'jig rten du// rang 'dzig pa sdig pa ci 'argyub sa// des dmug bsdus 'di wag// 'jigs su rung

269a3(mdo): lags ma// 'das bu phrin gyi sku 'ad legs pa ma tu nyon la yid mgung shin dang / ras bshad do// 'das bu skyon gyi bu 'on byung ba 'das pa'i nus na/ grong kyir pa ras min tshang dpon phyug cing no sa pas

269a8(mdo): mtha'i sa dang / nags tshal kyi sku dang / lam kyi bdi mdo'i sgra dang / sum mdo' sgra dang / gtor la lend pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i rwa dang / chos mthun pa sa/ tan tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i m+b+ha
269a9(mdo): nams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jig rten na yang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyas bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod kyi/ de yang de lta ma yin te/ gam rtagasal pa btab pa
269b1(mdo): rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po bzhin tu/ re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// ye ni gnas gsum 'tshogs pa las/ bu dang bu mo le bar 'gyur te/

269b3(mdo): lha mnyes par byas kyang / bu yang ma byung bu mo yang ma byung nas/ de'i blo 'di lta zhig skyes te/ ma la bdag gis chung ma zhig blangs na/ brgyal bu yod par 'gyur lta srid dam/ snyam ste/ des rigs mnya
269b4(mdo): ba las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu che zhing dga' la dka' mgur khyod do// de che zhing dka' la dga' mgur spyod pa la sa phyi zhig na/ bu chags par gyur nas// de dka' zhing

269b8(mdo): rgyud ring du gnas par shog shig// bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag gi phyir/ srang yang rung / nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis gang dngag
269b9(mdo): s+ye kI 'gro ba des// 'di song shig ces yon sngo bar shog shig ces dka' ba'i tshig brjod do// de nas des bu chags par rig nas/ bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag
270a1(mdo): sne/ grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang / tsha ba'i che tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstand pa'i zas rnams dang / hacang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang sbyar ba ma yin pa rnam

270b9(mdo): zas su skyugs pa za ba/ blo ba sha ra/ nga rnams pa ga/ gcin gis 'tsho ba/ na ka dang / khrag dang / phyis za ba/ myi bzad pa'i rang bzhin gis sdug pa/ lnga brgya gnas so// yang spras pa/ skyugs pa za zhing bor
271a1(mdo): ba2/ rang skabs gcin gis 'tshab dang / nas khrag da kyis// gyi bzad rang bzhin mug ci 'dug/ yangs pa can der bram ze zhig kyang 'dug skye/ des rigs mnyam pa lam rung /
